è¿‘æ—¥æœ‰è·Ÿå¥¹è”ç³»ä¸Šã€‚

æˆ‘åªå¸Œæœ›æˆ–è®¸èƒ½å¤Ÿå¤šè·Ÿå¥¹''äº†è§£ä¸€äº›''ï¼Œåœ¨ä¹å±‚æ¥¼ä¸­å¯¹è¿™ä¸ªäººç‰©å¤šäº›è¶…è„±å•å•æåçš„''åˆ»ç”»''ã€‚






1. Supervised internal relationship nonerotic sexual. Sporting.
2. Discovered secret hidden text from Harry Potter stories as inspired by a new teacher who's a real fan of reading the original text. Concerning an inner world for all wizards taking over primitive lives over.






Invitation to team work, late appearance. She replied my phone call using we chat. 
Also èµµå­æ°ã€é‚µç­‰äººã€‚åŸºæœ¬å…¨è¿Ÿã€‚

Remark: my inability to keep in contact casually lost me many could-have-been friends. Including females.






She did all those regularly and even this time went so far for this.trouble, Just to make it fun and make.me HAPPY.


å¦å¤–ä¸€åˆ™å…³äºå›¾ä¹¦é¦†å­¦ä¹ å®¤çš„å¸ƒå±€çš„ï¼šæŸéšè—çš„å­¦ä¹ å®¤åªæœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªå‡ºå…¥å£ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯éƒ½å¾ˆä¸æ–¹ä¾¿ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯å¢™å£åŠç©ºçš„ä¸€ä¸ªæ´ï¼Œæœ¨å¤´çš„ï¼Œåæ¥è¢«æˆ‘å¼„åäº†ã€‚






ç ´æ¡ˆã€å¯’è•Šï¼Ÿé¾™ä¹¡ã€Debsteï¼Œ
æ•´ç†ï¼Œ
æŸå¤§é¾„å¥³å¾‹å¸ˆ
å¥¶å¥¶ã€å§‘å¦ˆ

äº²æˆšæœ‹å‹ä»¬æ¥ç©å²æœ«ç®—è´¦å’Œäº‹ç‰©ä¹±å“„å“„

Bookeeping stress

æœ€åä¸€å¹•æ˜¯æˆ‘ä¸ŠåŠèº«æ“¦äº†è‚¥çš‚ã€éº»è£¤å’Œè¥¿è£¤è¿˜ç©¿åœ¨èº«ä¸Šï¼Œåœ¨å¨æˆ¿è·Ÿè€å¦ˆå¼å«ï¼šä½ åˆ°åº•æ˜¯æ´—ç¢—è¿˜æ˜¯æ´—æ¾¡ï¼Œæ´—ç¢—æ± é‡Œè¿˜æœ‰æ²¡æœ‰æ´—å®Œçš„ç¢—ï¼Œè€å¦ˆä¸çŸ¥é“åœ¨å¿™äº›ä»€ä¹ˆã€‚è¿™ä¸ªæ¢¦é¢‡æœ‰ç‚¹â€œé‡å¤çš„æ¢¦â€çš„æ„Ÿè§‰ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯æ€ä¹ˆä¹Ÿå®Œæˆä¸äº†çš„äº‹æƒ…ã€ä½†ä¸æ˜¯ç¼–ç¨‹æˆ–è€…UIã€è€Œæ˜¯ç°å®ä¸­çš„æ‚äº‹ã€‚

å†å¾€ä¹‹å‰æœ‰ä¸ªæ¥è‡ªå¤©ä¸Šçš„å¥³ç¥ã€å¾ˆå¤šå¾ˆå¤šäººçš„å­¦æ ¡èˆ¬å®¤å¤–æ“åœºä¸Šï¼ˆæ·±å¤œï¼‰å¥¹æƒ³è¦æ‰“æ£’çƒï¼Œæ¢è¾‰æˆ–è€…æŸåˆ«äººé—®æˆ‘æ‹¿å“ªä¸€ç§æ£’çƒç»™å¥¹ï¼Œæ²¡äººæ‹›å¾…å¥¹ï¼Œæˆ‘çœ‹å¥¹æ‹¿äº†æ£’çƒå‡ºäº†å­¦æ ¡å®‰å…¨åŒºã€è·‘åˆ°è¡—é“ä¸Šå»ç»ƒçƒï¼Œä¾¿è·Ÿåœ¨ä¸€æ—è€å¿ƒçš„çœ‹ç€å¥¹ã€‚åæ¥å¥¹å˜æˆäº†å¯’è•Šï¼ŒæŒ‡ç»™æˆ‘çœ‹å¥¹å¦ˆå¦ˆæœ‹å‹ä»¬é©¾é©¶ç€ä¸€è¾†è±ªåæ±½è½¦ã€è¯´å¦ˆå¦ˆæ›¾ç»ä¹Ÿæ˜¯æŸï¼Ÿé¾™ä¹¡çš„äººã€è¿˜æåˆ°ä¸ªæŸå“è´¨è®©æˆ‘è§‰å¾—è·Ÿè‡ªå·±å¾ˆåƒã€‚ç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸€èµ·åè½¦å»æŸä¸ªåœ°æ–¹ï¼Œç»“æœåˆ°äº†åƒæ˜¯æ—¥æœ¬çš„è¡—é“ä¸Šï¼Œäººä»¬æŒ‡ç€æˆ‘ä»¬è„šä¸Šçš„è¡€æ¸å’Œåœ°ä¸Šæ­»å»çš„å°å­©å’Œç ´åçš„äº‹ç‰©ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰è¯­è¨€åé©³ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è¢«æŠ“åˆ°è­¦å±€é‡Œé¢å…³èµ·æ¥ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¥ä¸ºè‡ªå·±æœ‰ç‰¹å¼‚åŠŸèƒ½å¯ä»¥æ‰“å¼€é”é“¾çš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¼¼ä¹æ³¨æ„åŠ›æ²¡æœ‰è¶³å¤Ÿä¸“æ³¨å¯ä»¥å½±å“è¿™äº›äº‹ç‰©ã€‚

å†å¾€å‰å­¦æ ¡æœ‰ä¸ªç‰¹åˆ«å¤§çš„å«ç”Ÿé—´ï¼Œå°±åƒæ˜¯å¤§æ¾¡å ‚å…¥å£çš„å…¨æ˜¯ç™½è‰²åœ°ç –çš„ã€æ€»æ˜¯æœ‰å†²æ´—è€Œåœ°é¢æ¹¿æ¼‰æ¼‰çš„å«ç”Ÿé—´ã€‚æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå©´å„¿ç”¨æŒ¡æ¿ä¸Šé¢å…¨æ˜¯æ°´ã€‚






# The Remark (of The Dream)

It was a **perfect day** at school, not too rushed and no need to prepare beforehand (recall usually during school we need to write homeworks etc. **beforehand** in order to **"properly manage time"**, I even have a term for it - **"æå‰é‡"**).

A surprisingly little **comfortable** dream. There was also a dream before that one. I even recorded the dreams while inside the (last) dream. **Not too memorable** to (demanding me to) remember it all - though it just leaves me **feel right** after waking up and don't really need to recall the exact memory.

# The Dream (The Middle One)

The first one was about something else so I won't recall, the last one was a **false awakening** where I recorded the first and the second dream. By the way I vaguely remember in the last dream I was expecting to go to school "as usual" then continue to have another day, so maybe it wasn't fake awakening after all and I was just doing my diary (in the dream) instead of dream journal.

In the second dream, I was back in a **high school** with teachers from my primary school and tutoring class in high school, and classmates from primary school. We were studying a **math** class, the pace of the lecture *wasn't too fast nor too slow*, and at the end of the day I felt casual enough (because there wasn't a mountain of homework) I could work on them in the sunset and thinking about what happened during the day and enjoying the moment, **not feeling tired**. Also I have plenty of **confidence** that the next day will be the same, and I will feel as comfortable after that.

# Psychoanalysis

I definitely don't feel as comfortable as depicted in this dream at UofT for my **Engineering Courses**. There are too many facets that can easily fail me, distract me, stress me, hurdle me, confuse me and bore me. In general the most serious issue during the first three years was the lectures are **not as well designed** as I would have expected, and there are more **practical strategy** and **teamwork** and **cramming** than **peaceful casual knowledge acquisition** and **meaningful practice**.

Why I had the dream I don't know, but I do sometimes have similar experience, especially when I am just taking one or two courses at a time in real world - I will momentarily feel the joy of not being rushed.

Also one important feature in dreams is that you **don't really feel tired** even after being chased around by a bunch of villains.

# The Inspiration

I reminds me that teaching should **integrate reviewing** as a genuine part of the learning process. As such, a self-contained course should consider **planned regular reviewing** (ideally in some meaningful practical form), e.g. per week, as part of the educational curriculum, with well selected materials. Such curriculum will ideally happen, for instance, in the hypothetical environment of **City of Nine**.

In the real life, what I can do as a student is to proactively **take notes to be reviewed** (v.s. **taking notes to be referenced**) (notice the distinction between those and **taking notes to serve as records**).

## Current Scheme and Distinction of Three Modes

I take notes as a **self-contained** piece of **individual work**, with the mindset that *all reference materials (lecture slides, some images etc.) may or may not be available at the time we are studying the finished notes*.

I will skip the tedious process of developing below scheme and focus on the practice of the scheme itself.

**Current Scheme**

I use **many pieces** of blank printing paper **without particular order**. A single piece of paper sever as dedicated **index** for the **subjects of notes**.

All notes are taking on **page-numbered** and **start-date numbered** papers with **the indices**. Where page number and date indicates **natural accumulation order** of notes, while the indexes indicate their **subject matter**.

Each note is a single line or a few lines of relevant items, and it's called a **slot**; Each note shouldn't be too long and should be limited to sentence-length. Such notes represent **knowledge-points**.

Each **non-text item** deserves it's own slot (e.g. a drawing, a diagram).

The process of taking notes always **goes forwards** and never goes backwards - instead of modifying created notes, all semantically or **subjectively relevant** notes are taken under the same **subject index**, rather than crowded under the same slot. **Modifications**, if applicable, are thus recorded in later slots.

All the above process needs is just **pen and paper**, thus it's not technology dependent and light-enough to be carried around.

Ideally there would be a **digitalization process** where we would convert individual notes into coherent pieces of documents for **searching** and **archiving**, which should be straightforward given above scheme.

**Example of Scheme**

Here is what the index paper looks like e.g. for a computer science course:

```
Index

1, Remark
2, High Level Comment
3, Course Information
4, University Facility, History, Anecdote, Building
5, Environemnt, Surronding
6, Formula, Math
7, Origin, History, Development, Academical
8, Measure
9, Object Name, Terminology
10, Source, Resource, Tool
11, Algorithm, Methods, Applications (Non-Domain)
12, Concept
13, Historical People
14, People Name, Personnel
15, Data, Number, Finance
16, Date
17, Idea
18, University Improvement Idea
19, Side Project, Personal Project, Utility Tool Idea, School Project Idea (Non School Bound)
20, Categorization System, Topic Modeling
21, Mindset, Perspective
22, Sexuality
23, To Do, To Learn, Background Required
24, Fun Stuff
25, Pattern, Classical Applications/Examples
26, Knowledge System Improvement
27, (Conceptual) Questions
28, Q/A Style Knowledge Points
```

The **exact indices** should be developed while the subjects are being learnt and not recommended to be designed beforehand.

Here is what note slots on each paper looks like:

```
>> Day 1 Page 1

1. Summer couse more casual and gentle
14. Lisa - Waterloo, Pure Science, Ads Company; Tony Justin, ECE
3. ANN, Deep Learning; Supervised, Unsupervised. Not math-oriented.
...

>> Page 2

3. 13 Weeks
3. Lab 3 is very important
11. Train a pigeon to identify binary results.
9. Neuron, cell, dendrite, axon, synapse, critical mass, stimulus
27. What kind of (physical) stimulus is causing brain cells to "react" (if so) during dreams?
...

>> Day 2 Page 3

27. Why is bias not assigned to input layer neurons individually? Like weight. A: Because that represent bias of the h_i neuron, not the upstream (upstream is already activated).
26. Present typed note pages work well
25. ANN: Input with identifiable array of elements, output as a categorized result.
...

```

For assurance, this scheme can handle notes with **dozens of indices/subject matters** and spread across less than **a hundred** pieces of papers. Haven't been using it for something larger than that yet.

Above process describes what I call **take notes to be referenced**.

**Taking Notes to be Referenced**

The principle of this practice is build a **self-contained** subject out of notes, instead of cross-referencing external resources.

**Taking Notes to Serve as Records**

In this mindset we take notes for the purpose of **recording what happened**, the trait of this kind of note-taking is **authenticity** - i.e. be as close as possible to the **original event** or the **listener's feelings**. This kind of notes is used *when the source of information is not retrivable*.

Also useful when taking notes **in-place**, e.g. directly on a **textbook**, recording ideas and remarks.

Not ideal in a **classroom setting** (ideally **lecture notes** should be provided by the lecturer, so the audience can just listen and take other types of notes.)

**Taking Notes to be Reviewed**

This is a new idea as inspired by the dream, suggesting that we should incorporate elements into note taking such that it can help us in the **review process** (review as in *refreshing knowledge*, not *prepare for exams*). I think the most important part of this is to identify the **knowledge points** that need to be **memorized**, for that is more efficient than reading things over again.

## Learnt to be Reviewed Framework

I think it would suffice and practical enough to have three simple annotation conventions to aid in this process: **Phases**, **Levels**, **Missings**.

**Phase**

A numerical series of stages indicating the set of subjects to be memorized.

**Level**

A numerical series of stages indicating the detail level required to properly memorize the subjects.

**Missing**

An indicator of **uncollected material** in the note, see **Exception Handling** below.

**Exception Handling**

In cases we will: 1) *Not have chance* to record what is expected to be reviewed; 2) Simply *can't record* what is expected to be reviewed e.g. it's a large diagram; 3) Don't realize a seemingly intuitive (because I already know, or we think we know because the lecturer's presentation was streamlined and rehearsed. In such cases it's important we proactively participate and *take a note of the occurence*.

## Remark

Clearly this is just a draft of that can be done, and the provided framework above is stil **rudimentary** pending further **practice** and **validation**, possibly with **customization** according to specific circumstances. However as a method for taking notes we should avoid making things over-complicated to reduce the system's **efficiency**.






ä¸‰ä¸ªä¸–ç•Œï¼ˆç»†èŠ‚ä¸¢å¤±ï¼‰\[äººé—´ï¼Ÿã€ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿã€å¥¹å¬å”¤/somehow æ‰§è¡Œ/æ‰“å¼€çš„ä¸–ç•Œ\]

æ§åˆ¶å°ã€ç™½èƒ¶è§¦æ‰‹æ‚¬æµ®

ç”·äººå¯¹å¥³äººè¯´ï¼Œ*"Nowaåœ¨ç”¨DDRä¼ è¾“ä¸€ä¸ªType1,ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚"*ã€‚ï¼ˆä¸‰ä¸ªæœ€æœ‰å…³é”®å­—ã€ä¸å«åå­—ï¼Œæœ¯è¯­ï¼‰\[ä¸€ä¸ªå¤§æ¦‚æ˜¯æ–¹å½¢æˆ–è€…åœ†å½¢çš„æˆ¿é—´ä¸­ã€åƒæ˜¯åœ°ä¸‹å®¤æ— çª—ï¼Œç¯å…‰æ˜æš—çœ‹ä¸åˆ°å¢™è¾¹ã€åªçœ‹åˆ°å±‹å­çš„ä¸­é—´æœ‰å‡ åˆ—ç¯å½¢å›´ç»•çš„å°å­ã€ä¸Šé¢æ”¾æœ‰ä¸ä¸€æ ·çš„**ä»ªå™¨/å±å¹•**ï¼Œä»¥åŠå‡ å¼ é‡‘å±çš„æ¤…å­ã€‚å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹å‘ä¸æ˜¯å°å­ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯ä¸€å¼ å¤§å‹çš„å››è§’ç»ç’ƒæŸœå­ï¼ŒæŸœå­é‡Œé¢ä¸¤è€…ç±»ä¼¼æ¿€å…‰çš„**çº¢è‰²å…‰çº¿**ã€æŸœå­æœ‰ä¸€ç±³æ¥é«˜ã€æ”¾åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªåŠäººé«˜çš„é‡‘å±å°å­ä¸Šï¼ŒæŸœå­åº•éƒ¨æ˜¯ç™½èƒ¶èˆ¬æè´¨çš„å°ºè®¸é•¿**è§¦æ‰‹çŸ©é˜µ**â€”â€”è¯´æ˜¯è§¦æ‰‹æ˜¯å› ä¸ºè¿™äº›åœ†æŸ±å½¢çš„ç™½èƒ¶çŠ¶ç‰©ä½“åƒæ˜¯æœ‰é£ä»ä¸‹å¾€ä¸Šå¹ä¸€èˆ¬ä¸åœåœ°åœ¨ä¸è§„åˆ™æ‘‡æ‘†ã€‚åœ¨æŸœå­çš„æ­£ä¸­é—´æ‚¬æµ®åœ¨ç©ºä¸­çš„æ˜¯æŸæ ·æˆ‘ä¸è®°å¾—çš„äº‹ç‰©ã€æˆ–è®¸æ˜¯ä¸»æœºã€æˆ–è®¸æ˜¯æŸç§ç«‹åœºã€æˆ–è®¸æ˜¯æŸäº›ç¦»å­æ€æ¸¸ç¦»ç‰©è´¨â€”â€”å½“ç”·äººè¯´é“â€œå¥¹â€åœ¨ä¼ è¾“object/ç‰©è´¨æ—¶ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯æŒ‡ç€è¿™ä¸ªæŸœå­ä¸­çš„ç‰©ä½“â€”â€”æ‰€ä»¥è¿™ä¸ªç‰©ä½“è¦ä¹ˆæ˜¯æŸç§æŒ‡ç¤ºè®¾å¤‡ï¼Œè¦ä¹ˆå°±æ˜¯ä¼ è¾“åª’ä»‹æœ¬èº«\]\[å…·ä½“çš„è¯æ±‡è™½ç„¶ä¸è®°å¾—ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¯¹äºå½“æ—¶ä½¿ç”¨çš„å«ä¹‰è¿˜æ˜¯æœ‰å°è±¡â€”â€”å¥‡ç‰¹çš„æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥è¿™èˆ¬è®°ä½**è¯­è¨€çš„å«ä¹‰**è€Œä¸æ˜¯è¯æ±‡æœ¬èº«â€”â€”å…¶ä¸­NowaæŒ‡åå­—ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªå®Œå…¨æ˜¯é†’æ¥ç¼–çš„æ›¿ä»£ç”¨è¯ï¼Œæ¢¦ä¸­ç”·äººæˆ–è®¸å‹æ ¹æ²¡è¯´åå­—ã€‚ç„¶åâ€œåœ¨ç”¨ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿä¼ è¾“â€œé‡Œé¢æ˜æ˜¾æåˆ°äº†æŸä¸€ä¸ª**å…·ä½“åè®®çš„åå­—**ã€è€Œä¸”ç»å¯¹ä¸æ˜¯DDRï¼Œè¿™ä¹Ÿæ˜¯é†’æ¥ä¸´æ—¶ç¼–çš„æ›¿ä»£è¯ã€‚è€ŒType1æŒ‡çš„å«ä¹‰ï¼ˆæ ¹æ®æˆ‘çš„ç†è§£ï¼‰è¯¥æ˜¯â€œæ¥è‡ªäººé—´/åœ°çƒçš„äººç±»â€è¿™æ ·çš„åˆ†ç±»æœ¯è¯­ï¼Œâ€œType1â€æœ¬èº«ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ç¼–çš„ï¼Œä¸æ˜¯åŸè¯ã€‚å¦å¤–æ¢¦ä¸­è¿˜æœ‰å°è±¡åœ¨è¿™ä¸€å¥å¯¹è¯ä¸­æåˆ°å¦å¤–ä¸€ä¸ªæœ¯è¯­ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘ä¸è®°å¾—æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆäº†ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¸è®°å¾—æ€ä¹ˆä½¿ç”¨åˆ°çš„ã€‚\]

\[å› ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆåŸå› ç”·äººå’Œå¥³äººè¯­è¨€ä¸Šargueä¹‹åå‘å¯¹æ–¹æ‰”æ¤…å­å’Œæ¯å­\]æ‰“æ–—/æ‰“é—¹ã€ä¼¼ä¹èº«æå°ºå¯¸ï¼ˆå¥³ã€å¾®æ³¢ç‚‰ï¼Œç”·ã€æ¤…å­ï¼‰è¿˜ä¸æ˜¯è‡ªå·±çš„åœ°æ–¹\[è¿‘çœ‹åˆ°äººæ—¶å…¶ä¸­çš„ç”·äºº/å¥³äººä¸æ˜¯ååœ¨æ¤…å­ä¸Šçš„ã€è€Œæ˜¯ç«™åœ¨æ¤…å­ä¸Šâ€”â€”äººå¾ˆå°ï¼Œå€’åƒæ˜¯å°äººå›½çš„äººç«™åœ¨äº†æ­£å¸¸ä¸–ç•Œçš„æ¤…å­ä¸Šã€æˆ–è€…å¦‚é©¬è¾¾åŠ æ–¯åŠ çš„ä¼é¹…èˆ¬æ»‘ç¨½\]ï¼›å€’åƒæ˜¯å®¶å® è¶ç€ä¸»äººä¸åœ¨å·ç©è®¾å¤‡æ‰®æ¼”â€œä¸“ä¸šäººå‘˜â€ã€‚

æˆ‘çš„ä¸–ç•Œï¼ŒPeaceful Villageä¸€èˆ¬ã€‚\[è™½ä¸æ˜¯æ–¹å—/voxelçŠ¶ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä»ä¼ è¾“åè®®ä¸­å‡ºæ¥ä¹‹åâ€œæˆ‘â€æ¥åˆ°ä¸€ç‰‡é»„è‰²å…‰åœˆç¬¼ç½©çš„æ£®æ—ä¸­å¤®çš„å¹³åœ°ä¸­ã€‚èµ°å‡ºå»ç»™æˆ‘çš„æ„Ÿè§‰æ˜¯å¥¹è‡ªå·±å»æ‰“é€ çš„è¿™ä¸ªåŠéšæœºç”Ÿæˆçš„ä¸–ç•Œâ€”â€”å°±æœ‰ç§**æˆ‘çš„ä¸–ç•Œ**æ¸¸æˆèˆ¬çš„è‡ªç”±ã€‚å°è±¡ä¸­æ­¤æ—¶å¥¹å¹¶ä¸åœ¨æˆ‘èº«è¾¹ï¼Œåˆ°å¥½ä¼¼å› ä¸ºäººç‰©æ˜¯ä¼ è¾“åˆ°å¥¹æ‰€æ“æ§çš„ä¸–ç•Œä¸­è¿™ä¸ªæ—¶å€™å¥¹åº”è¯¥é€šè¿‡æŸç§å±å¹•åœ¨è§‚çœ‹ç€ã€‚\]
ä¹˜èˆ¹ã€**ä¸å¤šè¯**ï¼ˆå¾ˆå–œæ¬¢è¿™ç§æ„Ÿè§‰ï¼‰ï¼Œï¼ˆè¦å»ï¼‰å¯»æ‰¾æŸæ ·ä¸œè¥¿ã€‚â€œä½ ä¸å‘¼å¸å•Šâ€ï¼Œå¥¹é—®ã€‚ä¸€ä¸ªæ’æ°”æ‰‡ç”¨èˆ¬é»„è‰²å¡‘æ–™è½¯ç®¡ã€å·¨æµªæ‰‘å²¸ã€‚è½¯ç®¡æˆ‘æ‹¿è¿‡æ¥çœ‹çœ‹é‡Œé¢åƒæ˜¯ç”¨æ¥åšè¿‡å¨æˆ¿ä¸‹æ°´é“ã€ç„¶åå†æ³¥æ²™ä¸­æµ¸æ³¡è¿‡å–å‡ºæ¥ä¸å®Œå…¨æ¸…æ´—å¹²å‡€ã€‚ç®¡å­åŠå¾„å‹‰å‹‰å¼ºå¼ºç½©ä½é¼»å£æˆ‘è¯•äº†è¯•å‘¼å¸è¿˜è¡Œä¼°è®¡ä½œç”¨åªå¤Ÿé¿å…æµ·æ°´å‘›ç€ã€‚

åœ¨è·¯ä¸Šèµ°ã€ç»è¿‡å•†åº—*æœ‰ä¸€åˆ»å¿«è¦è¿›å…¥ï¼ˆä»”ç»†çœ‹å¸ƒç½®ï¼‰æ¸…é†’çŠ¶æ€çš„*ã€ä½†é‚£ä¸ªç¬é—´æ„Ÿå—åˆ°çš„*å‘¨å›´ç¯å¢ƒå½¢æ€ï¼ˆå¿«è¦ï¼‰å˜åŒ–å†³å®šè¿˜æ˜¯followåŸå…ˆçš„æ•…äº‹å¥½*ï¼Œä¾¿å¼±åŒ–**attention**ã€ä½†è¿˜æ˜¯momentarilyåšåˆ°äº†å¯ä»¥æ›´ä»”ç»†ç«¯è¯¦äº‹ç‰©ï¼ˆæˆ–è®¸è¿™ä¸ªå¯¼è‡´åæ¥é†’æ¥è®°æ¢¦ä¸æ¸…æ¥šï¼‰ï¼ˆç«¯è¯¦ç»†èŠ‚å·²ç»å¿˜äº†ï¼‰ï¼ˆè¿™ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†æ˜¯å›æœ”æ‰æƒ³èµ·æ¥çš„ï¼‰

ä¸Šèˆ¹åˆ°åˆ°è¾¾æ˜¯è·³è·ƒè¿‡æ¥çš„æ•…äº‹ã€‚

åˆ°è¾¾ä¸€ä¸ªå­¦æ ¡èˆ¬åœ°æ–¹ã€‚ä¸€ä¸ªå«ç”Ÿé—´éš”é—´ï¼Œæˆ‘é¡¶ç€é—¨ï¼Œå¥¹è·ªåœ¨åœ°ä¸Šå¼€å§‹ç¿»å¼„é©¬æ¡¶ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¥ä¸ºå¥¹ä¼šä»¥ä¸ºæˆ‘æ²¡è§è¿‡è¿™æ ·çš„æ“ä½œé—®æˆ‘å¥¹åˆ°åº•åœ¨å¹²ä»€ä¹ˆï¼Œå¿ƒæƒ³è‡ªå·±åœ¨**å“ˆåˆ©æ³¢ç‰¹**é‡Œé¢å¯æ˜¯çœ‹åˆ°è¿‡ç±»ä¼¼çš„é€šè¿‡é©¬æ¡¶ä¼ è¾“åˆ°åˆ«çš„ç©ºé—´çš„äº‹æƒ…ã€‚ç»“æœå¥¹ä»€ä¹ˆä¹Ÿæ²¡é—®ï¼Œå°±ä¸“æ³¨çš„åœ¨é‡Œé¢å’Œåé¢æå¼„ä»€ä¹ˆã€‚

åŠ¨ä½œæŒºèæ´½ã€å¤–é¢çœ‹åˆ™å¯èƒ½ä»¥ä¸ºæš§æ˜§çš„äº‹ï¼Œé—¨æ²¡å…³å¥½çœ‹åˆ°ä¸ªå°ä¼™å­æˆ´çœ¼é•œã€‚ï¼ˆæ•…äº‹ä¸­çš„è‡ªå·±å®Œå…¨æ²¡æœ‰è‡ªå·±çš„IDç‰¹ç‚¹ã€ä¸»è¦æ˜¯followå‘å±•ï¼‰

ï¼ˆå‰ä¸€æ—¥å…ƒç´ ï¼šå¤–å‡ºè·Ÿè€å¦ˆå’ŒJerryæ•£æ­¥å‘¼å¸ä¸ç•…ä»”ç»†å—…é¼»å­ğŸ‘ƒï¼Œå‰å‰æ—¥åœ¨è¯»å…³äºæ¢¦çš„å“²å­¦æ¢è®¨æåŠæ¢¦å’Œç°å®å’ŒçœŸå®å­˜åœ¨çš„å…³ç³»ï¼Œä»Šå¤©è¦ä¿®å®¶ä¸­æŠ½æ°´é©¬æ¡¶ï¼Œæ˜¨æ™šç¡å‰æƒ³åˆ°Harry Potteræ˜¯æˆ‘æœ€å–œæ¬¢çš„ç”µå½±ã€æ¯æ¬¡çœ‹éƒ½æ„Ÿè§‰å¾ˆå¥½ï¼‰

å°éš”é—´ã€ä¸‹æŒ‰ã€ä¸Šé¢æ–°çš„å°éš”é—´ã€æŸœå­æŸœå­æŸœå­ã€è‚‰é¥¼å’ŒGyugyuyaç‚¸çŒªæ’ã€ä¿é²œæŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œé—»ä¸€é—»å†·æ‰çš„é¦™å‘³æ— å¼‚å‘³ï¼Œå“å°ã€‚

å¥¹ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿèˆ¬ï¼ˆå¦‚è·è‡³å®+æœ€ç»ˆå¾—åˆ°ï¼‰åƒäº†ä¸¤å£çš±çš±çœ‰ï¼Œä¼¼ä¹ä¹Ÿè§‰å¾—å‘³é“å¹¶ä¸ç‰¹åˆ«ç†æƒ³ï¼Œç„¶åä¾¿æ‰”æ‰äº†ã€‚

ï¼ˆå¥¹æ€ä¹ˆæ¶ˆå¤±/æ­»æ‰çš„ï¼Œæˆ‘ç„¶åæ€ä¹ˆå›å»çš„ï¼‰ã€‚

**Questionï¼š**ä½ çŸ¥é“è‡ªå·±åœ¨å¦ä¸€ä¸ªä¸–ç•Œä¸­ã€é€šè¿‡æŸç§èƒ½é‡ä¼ è¾“è¿‡æ¥ï¼Œæˆ–è€…å°±è¯´æ˜¯ä½ æ€€ç–‘è‡ªå·±åœ¨æ¢¦ä¸­â€”â€”æƒ³åˆ°ç›—æ¢¦ç©ºé—´ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¸èƒ½å¤Ÿç¡®å®šè‡ªå·±æ˜¯å¦çœŸçš„åœ¨æ¢¦ä¸­ï¼Œæœ€é‡è¦çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œå³ä¾¿è‡ªå·±ç¡®è®¤è‡ªå·±åœ¨å¦ä¸€ä¸ªä¸–ç•Œâ€”â€”ä¾‹å¦‚æˆ‘ç°åœ¨å°±çŸ¥é“è‡ªå·±æ˜¯ä»åˆšåˆšçš„åœ°æ–¹ç»å¥¹ä¼ é€è¿‡æ¥çš„â€”â€”ä½†æˆ‘ä¸çŸ¥é“ç¦»å¼€è¿™ä¸ªä¸–ç•Œçš„æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯æ­»äº¡ã€è¿˜æ˜¯å¤–éƒ¨é¡»å¾—æœ‰äººã€å°±åƒæ˜¯Star Trekä¸€æ ·ã€ä¸»åŠ¨ä¼ é€è‡ªå·±å‡ºå»ã€‚æˆ‘è¯•äº†è¯•æŠ¬èµ·åŒæ‰‹å‘ç€å¤©èŠ±æ¿ç¤ºæ„ã€å¥½ä¼¼æœ‰äººä¼šåœ¨çœ‹ç€æˆ‘çš„ä¸¾åŠ¨ï¼ˆå¤–é¢çš„äººå…¶å®åªèƒ½å¤Ÿspeculate signalã€ä½†å…¶å®çœ‹ä¸è¿›å»å¥¹çš„ç³»ç»Ÿã€è€Œç°åœ¨ä¹Ÿä¸çŸ¥é“åœ¨ä¸åœ¨äº†ï¼‰ï¼Œç„¶åè§‰å¾—è¿™ä¸ªåŠ¨ä½œæœ‰ç‚¹è ¢ã€‚å¯»æ€åˆ«çš„æ–¹æ³•/è¡Œä¸ºã€‚

\[è¿™å„¿è¿˜æœ‰ä¸€æ®µä»å«ç”Ÿé—´ä¸Šå»å›åˆ°å»ºç­‘ä¸­åˆ°å¤„ä¹±èµ°å¯»æ‰¾å‡ºå£å’Œçœ‹åˆ°è®¸å¤šäººå’Œè¿‡é“å¸ƒç½®â€”â€”è¿™ä¸€æ®µåœ¨æ¢¦ä¸­æ—¶å€™åº”è¯¥æ˜¯é¢‡æœ‰äº›ç»†èŠ‚çš„ï¼Œç°åœ¨ä¸è®°å¾—äº†ã€‚\]

æ€»ç®—åˆ°äº†æ™¨é—´ï¼Œæˆ‘è¸Šå‡ºé—¨ã€‚ç©¿ç™½è¢çš„å’Œéª·é«…ã€‚
ä¸‰ä¸ªæŒ‡ä½¿çƒ¹é¥ªçš„åŒ»æŠ¤äººå‘˜ï¼Œæ€äº†æ— å…³ç³»ï¼ˆæ²¡æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆå››æº…é£æ•£çš„è¡€æ¶²ï¼‰ï¼Œæªæ¢°ä¸ä¾¿æ­¤æ—¶ç«‹å³æ‰“å“å®Œå…¨çš„åŠ¿åŠ›\[æˆ‘ç™½å¤©å‡ºå»åˆ°é™¢å­ä¹‹åâ€”â€”è¯è¯´è¿™ä¸ªæ—¶å€™æˆ‘å‡ºæ¥çš„åœ°æ–¹åƒæ˜¯ä¸€åº§åœŸåº™ã€è€Œé™¢å­åƒæ˜¯åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ‚¬æµ®å±±å²›çš„ä¸­å¤®â€”â€”é¢‡æœ‰ç§å®¤å¤–æ¡ƒå›­ä¹‹æ„Ÿâ€”â€”å››å‘¨ç©ºæ—·ä¼¼ä¹æ˜¯å¤©ç©ºâ€”â€”è®¸å¤šåˆ«çš„äººéšæˆ‘ä¹‹åä¸€èµ·å‡ºæ¥äº†ï¼Œå¤§è‡´æœ‰ä¸¤ç±»ï¼šç˜¦éª¨å¦‚æŸ´æˆ–è€…å¹²è„†å°±æ˜¯åªæœ‰éª·é«…æ¨¡æ ·ï¼ˆå¾ˆå¹²å‡€ï¼‰çš„â€œé¬¼â€ï¼Œå’Œç©¿ç€ç™½å¤§è¤‚ä½†æ˜¯äººæ ·çš„â€œåŒ»ç”Ÿâ€ã€‚æˆ‘åˆ°äº†é™¢å­ä¹‹åæœ‰åŒ»ç”ŸæŒ‡ç¤ºæˆ‘å»ç»™ä»–ä»¬çƒ¹é¥ªï¼ˆæ—©é¤ï¼Ÿï¼‰ï¼Œæˆ‘ä¸çŸ¥å“ªæ¥çš„æƒ³æ³•ï¼ˆä½†ä¸æ˜¯å¸¦æœ‰æ„¤æ¨çš„æ€å¿µï¼Œè€Œå¥½æƒ³å•çº¯æ˜¯æ„Ÿå—åˆ°æ¸¸æˆå‰§æƒ…å‡ºå‘éœ€è¦è€Œè¯¥å»è¿›è¡Œçš„æŸç§æ“ä½œï¼‰ç›´æ¥æŠŠä»–ä»¬å‡»å®äº†ï¼ˆç”¨æªæˆ–è€…ç”¨æ‰‹ã€ä½†æ˜¯ä¸æ¯«ä¸æ˜¯å¤æ‚çš„åŠ¨ä½œï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯ç®€å•çš„æŠ¬æŠ¬æ‰‹èˆ¬å°±å®Œæˆäº†çš„è¡Œä¸ºï¼‰ï¼Œç„¶åè„‘æµ·ä¸­æœ‰å¿µæƒ³æ˜¯å¦åº”è¯¥æ€‚æ¿åˆ«çš„é¬¼ä¹ŸåŠ å…¥æˆ‘ã€ä¸€èµ·æŠŠè¿™äº›åŒ»ç”Ÿéƒ½å‰¿ç­â€”â€”å› ä¸ºåé¢è®°å½•çš„åŸå› â€”â€”ä½†æ˜¯åˆæœ‰å¿µå¤´å‘Šè¯‰æˆ‘ï¼ˆå€’å¥½åƒæ˜¯æŒ‰ç…§é¡ºåºå‘å±•çš„æƒ…èŠ‚è€Œä¸æ˜¯è‡ªå·±çš„ä¸»è§‚æ€è€ƒï¼Œæ›´åˆ«æä¸æ¯«conflictingçš„æ„Ÿå—â€”â€”åªæ˜¯æŒ‰ç…§é¡ºåºæ€ç»ªçš„è¿‡åœºï¼‰è¿™ä¸ªæ—¶å€™è¿™æ ·åšæˆ–è®¸å¤ªè¿‡ç«ã€åå€’å¯èƒ½å¼•ç«ä¸Šèº«\]ã€‚â€œæŠŠé¬¼å½“æˆå¥´å½¹ã€çƒ§èœæ‰“æ‚ç­‰ç­‰â€ã€‚ç™½å¤§è¢ã€‚\[ç»†èŠ‚ä¸elaborate\]

--- 

**Remarks**

1. è®°å¿†ä¸å…¨ã€‚ä¸å¤ªæƒ³Recallï¼Œä½†ï¼ˆè§‰ç€ï¼‰ä¸¢äº†å¯æƒœã€‚
2. é‡‡ç”¨å›æœ”å’Œå…³é”®å­—ã€‚
3. è€å¦ˆåœ¨ã€èººç€è¾¹ç”¨æ‰‹æœºä¸ä¾¿ï¼ˆä¼šæ‰¹è¯„æˆ‘ï¼‰ã€‚
4. åŸæœ¬æ—©æ™¨é†’æ¥ä¸ä¹…è¿˜æˆ–è®¸å¯ä»¥ååœ¨ç”µè„‘å‰å¡«å……ä¸€ä¸‹ç»†èŠ‚çš„ï¼Œç™½å¤©è¯¸å¤šäº‹æƒ…è€½è¯¯ï¼Œåˆ°äº†æ™šä¸Šä¾¿ä¸æƒ³ï¼ˆç¼ºä¹çµæ„Ÿå’ŒåŠ¨åŠ›ï¼‰å»è´¹å¿ƒåŠ›è”ç»“é‚£äº›*é›¶é›¶æ•£æ•£çš„ç‰‡æ®µè®°å¿†*äº†ï¼›è€ƒè™‘åˆ°**è‰ºæœ¯å‘å±•**ï¼ˆå‚è€ƒä»·å€¼ï¼‰å’Œ**å¯ç”¨æ€§**çš„éœ€è¦ï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯é€‚å½“è¡¥å……äº†ä¸€äº›è§£é‡Šâ€”â€”ä¸ç„¶å¾ˆå¯èƒ½*è¿‡ä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´è‡ªå·±ä¹Ÿå¿˜äº†å½“æ—¶åˆ°åº•æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆ*â€”â€”æœ€è¿‘å‘ç°æœ‰äº›æ¢¦è®°å°±å·²ç»å‡ºç°è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µäº†ã€‚

ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆæŠŠè¿™ä¸€ç¯‡æ ‡è®°ä¸ºEpicï¼Ÿæˆ‘æƒ³æ˜¯å› ä¸ºï¼š
1ï¼‰ä¸€æ¥æˆ‘æ²¡æœ‰åˆ«çš„æ›´å¥½çš„åˆ†ç±»ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªæ¢¦æ¶‰åŠå†…å®¹å’Œåœºæ™¯å˜æ¢æ¯”è¾ƒå¤šæ‰€ä»¥ä¸å¤ªå¥½tagåˆ°å•å•å…·ä½“çš„äº‹ç‰©ä¸Šå»ï¼›
2ï¼‰è¿™ä¸ªæ¢¦é†’æ¥åçš„æ„Ÿè§‰è¿˜æŒºå¥½ï¼Œå¤šåŠå› ä¸ºå†…å®¹è¿˜ç®—å……å®ã€‚







æ¯å¤©å›åˆ°å®¶ï¼ˆå®—é‚¸ï¼‰ç¬¬ä¸€ä»¶äº‹éƒ½æ˜¯æ²æµ´ã€ç„¶åæŠŠæ—§è¡£æœæŠ›ä¸‹æ°´æ± ï¼Œæ°´é¢å°±ä¼šå¼€å§‹é™ä½ï¼Œä¸‹é™åˆ°æ·±åº•ä¸‹çš„ä¸€ä¸ªé»‘è‰²å¹³å°ä¸­ã€‚

æ­¤åœ¨ä¸€ç™½å²©å±±æ´ä¹‹ä¸­ï¼Œå…¥å£å’Œæ± å­çš†ä¸ºæ¾„è“æ³‰æ°´ã€ä¸€é½æ¶Œä¸‹æ·±ä¸è§åº•çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæ·±æ¶§ä¹‹ä¸­ã€‚æ²æµ´ä¸ºæ´èº«ã€æ•™ä¹‰ä»¥çº¯æ´å¿ƒçµæœä¾çœŸä¸»ã€‚äººæœ¬ä¸éœ€è¡£ç‰©ã€‚

æ°´é¢ä¸‹é™é€æ¸æµ®ç°æ°´æ± åº•åº§ç›¸æ¥çš„å°é˜¶ã€èµ¤ç€èº«å­æ²¿ç€å°é˜¶èµ°ä¸‹å»ã€‚åŠè·¯ä¹‹ä¸­æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªç£è§†å¥³å­ï¼ˆèŒä½ï¼‰ï¼Œä¼˜é›…çš„æŠ›ç»™å¥¹ä¸€ä»¶ç»¸è¢ã€‚ä¾§èººåœ¨å®›è‹¥ç èšŒçš„å¹³å°ä¸Šã€‚â€œYou still need clothes to us.â€èº«æå§£å¥½éšç°åœ¨åŠé€æ˜çš„ç™½ç»¸è¡£ç¼ä¸­ã€‚

**Remark**

1. éæˆ‘è§†è§’ã€‚è§‚å¯Ÿè€…ã€‚
2. åŸç”Ÿæ¢¦å¢ƒæ´ç©´æœ¬èº«å²©çŸ³ç»“æ„è§†è§‰æ¯”è¾ƒç²—ç³™ã€åƒæ˜¯MCæˆ–è€…æŸæ—©å¹´3Dæ¸¸æˆã€‚äººç‰©ã€å¯¹è¯å’Œå…¶ä»–ç»†èŠ‚è¿˜ç®—ç»†è‡´ã€‚
3. æ¢¦é†’ååŸç”Ÿå¯¹è¯å…¨ç„¶ä¸è®°å¾—æ¸…æ™°ã€éƒ½ç”¨ï¼ˆæ‹¬å·ï¼‰è¡¨ç¤ºä¸ç¡®å®šçš„ï¼›è¿™ä¸ªæ¢¦å¯¹è¯æœ¬ä¹Ÿä¸å¤šï¼Œä¸‰äº”å¥







Imagine large meatballs living in condos - that's what it feels like to live in soups as a dish. 

## The Story

Sex.. ghosts.  Gays... Violent pemetration. Finding people. A lot of chat. (What about scenary?)

I was searching for someone/something either with mom or someone else, on 18th floor in our condo, where the condo itself is more like a hotel - just like what UofT chestnut residence used to be. The thing is, when we took the elevator, we were sent to 19th floor instead of 18, so we  need to take stairs downstairs but the problem is we couldn't find the room marked with our unit number. The layout of the floor was complicated.

I was a at home alone and worried my friend might get lost. I planned to go looking for her when ???. At that time 5 **others** appeared at my home (most likely in some order within some time period but details lost). One of them was like the fat boy I knew from high school at ICT.

I was having sex with the lower trunk of a woman which looks realistic but felt like a rubber toy. The thrusts was quite practical and it took several minutes before I ejaculate. I might have done something else before I woke up but one thing I did thought about (though didn't check for sure) was that "**sex in dreams** usually don't cause **wet dreams**, pressure in dreams does, and that dream was quite relaxing." During the morning when I woke up my body was clean except for some sweat.

## Take Away

If I could have remembered the structure of the dream, that would be a useful inspiration, for the haunted building definitely was something fun.

If I could have remembered the conversation between people them that would serve as some useful material for psychoanalytis.

The details regarding the lower trunk of the woman and my detailed intercouse with it (including touching its non-visisble breasts and the shape of its labia) can be elaborated a bit.

My gay interaction with Peter can be elaborated a bit. We were definitely touching each other. 

I also fairly remembering looking down into the street, it would be nice if we have remembered detailed settings.

There were fighting and sighting of ghost-like figures and mystical forces in the dream that caused all the weired effects and plot related elements (e.g. when she was lost) - however details are forgotten.

## Remark

0. Details partially lost; Conversations are all lost, there were plenty of them
1. Might be inspired by yesterday as dream
2. Might be inspired by yesterday's reading about hell especially for those after lust
3. Why is this ranked "spectacular"? Never before have I recorded a sex in dream so far so mildly peaceful (though inside a haunted building) (per impression), and the overall tone of the ghost-story felt mildly intriguing.






Thankfully Gandalf is our friend.

If you jump upwards, there is at least 5 **layers** of the same land, each constructed on top of each other with **stone pillars**. He stopped at the fourth, look around at the remaining villagers, and decided to took over the magical land.

He collected all the **seven magical stones**, placed them inside the **ruined circle** (on the desert), used his own power to activate all of them and an array of other power stones. Then he cleared his throat, blow the whistle, and people all over the dreamland can hear his voice in their ears: "I, Gandalf, Claim this land..." 

The first thing he changed, is to stop using ...  (Detail forgotten)

There was a battle in the cafe, I took some friends running into the inner big toilet (almost like a indoor swimming pool size), attempted to manifest some dream objects to alter the course of the story.






Drove the car crushing into the back wall where the latest stand in the annual ruler ceremony in this (sky, steam punk) colony city.

Sometimes when walking on the street, seeing her screaming "we are on a trip" making her male partner feeling lightly awkward in the crowd reminds me of a time when all of us were all together travelling out and partying and chatting in the bedroom of my cousin's.

A young girl went my home this morning, seeking some food and then devices (decides) to jump out of the balcony window and climb onto the adjacent unit instead of just using the hallway. I thought that was fun, and demonsrated my gifted skills at climbing walls on the ground to reach the second level of our building.

Real world is constricted (constrained) especially in a modern city, you can't just play around and run around and jump through hurdles and hide in a construction site and play with all construction materials or just manuvour the complicated half-opened landscape.

Having a friend to do this with you is even better, you can look out for each other and escape the site keepers' hands, hide in their caves. And one day there are those students from some famous university, carry those black boxed tripod laser measuring device with fancy LED touch screen, standing on top of the hills not even bothering going down to the field at all, "exploring" the landscape at such a distance seems totally pointless but they might think it's more efficient and educated. 

One of the guys setting up monitoring and digital equipments in the cave saw us and it's wise to pretend to be one of them.

So I met this guy who's been studying in a high school (and middle school) which everyone else laugh at because it's off the town.

The company owns a large land and facilities covering schools, kindergartens, medical research center (with gigantic outdoor movable building shields), universities, worker-class residence, and streets.

It's not easy to pretend to be a royal family.

That student turns out to be a young boy that j didn't expect. He definitely admired my to live in that noble family in the town. "You don't recognize that (sports) car? That's your sister's". "Of course I do". 

He went wild when he opened an Avis rental car's door and drive around in circle at the parking lot, I bet he does this a lot because though under age he's pretty good and I couldn't stop him.

I give up and decided to leave. Standing on the wet grass land makes my footware dirty. It's a new sport shoes I discovered in the closet this morning.

I saw some familiar car and went in, it's a man j sort of recognize. "Sorry I am in an inconvenient time, maybe the next person can carry you." Where is my own damn car!

"Hes her brother. He's Leng ??".

All females drive sports car, males drive SUV. 

"So have you figured out who you are?" He looked friendly and someone to help me.

"Who are you? My boss?" I was confused.

"My sir, I serve you" He's polite and patient.

It was a rainy night.






(Theme Song: This is a Magician)

I announced the news while we were moving in the sub-train. The headmaster was just sitting next to me but he doesn't know me so that gave me some chance to practice tonight's fight rather than being disturbed by his presence. I told Jerry and some classmates the proper way was to memorize all the singings rather than prepare a spell book. It's more efficient to recite in mind than read. Jerry didn't believe me. Well I couldn't completely recite in mind as well but at least reciting is more efficient than reading.

One lower grade psychic and intellectually underdeveloped student got too close to me and stole a lot of energy from me that enables himself floating in the air, but j don't need to bother with him because I have some redundant energy. Must be careful next time.

After getting off the clean but crowded sub-train we get off the second floor of the bujldkng. The first floor was studying area with large modern long tables and all glass walls. It's a modern office tower. We own the first few floors. I didn't bother walk, but flied all the way downstairs, Mr. Yang saw me and smiled at me. 

Unlike other people I spent enough effort developing martial arts.

Tonight is the night j will challenge our headmaster Victor Zhu and prove myself qualified for standalone actions.

(New) (Perception) Boost-Accelerared Flying with zoomed in visual focus. Pass-by large piece of Mantle historical building with red color and flag of the state. This reminds me of spider man except we are the magicians.

Mature students can almost all fly. Some of higher grades girls who are fond of me (å€™å®‡å®£ and othersï¼‰ quickly catch up from behind.

ã€One year horizon ï¼ˆanalysisï¼Ÿï¼‰






No nudity, no sex, but prostitution.

Three scenes. The first I was travelling with è©è¨, mending romantic affairs of people, and end up discovering her own troubles. Much happened. Not recorded. It was quite **special**.

The second scene was back in secondary school during long lunch break and people keep talking and there were many events happening including chemistry lab and selling vaccine and medicines. Talked with many of the earlier female friends, revisited the friendly memory. It was not romance, and we were close. Bodily close.

The third scene was I was visiting a prostitution house, at first not realizing, but went their as sort of routine of school, which turns out gave been turned into a student run prostitution institute. Cheryl guided me about how others can live better this way. She was pretty with her usual make up. **Her index and middle fingers danced on my fingers**, complaining a bit about me not knowing much but telling me rest assured she can find her "sisters" no more than 4 years older than me that might be interested in me. She told me for a bit more interesting play she would use oral and other common techniques, but as a beginner I can just make it easy. Looking at her, I wondered, *maybe all pretty girls survived this way*.

Much other details are not recorded. The above brief is only recorded due to their uniqueness. English is chosen for this dream so it's a little obsecure (to mundane Chinese). This is because yesterday I had a suspicion that one, *not matter how much he loved the culture of his country, cannot expect to be understood by Chinese people after all*. (And thus probably for **Project Nine** we should aim at English community-first as well)

è®°å¾—â€œåˆšæ¥â€çš„æ—¶å€™å½“æ—¶è€çˆ¸åœ¨å¼€ä¸€è¾†Vanæˆ‘ä»¬ç»è¿‡äº†é‚£ä¸ªMonkeyï¼ˆçº¢è‰²è­¦æˆ’å¯å‘ï¼Ÿï¼‰è£…é¥°çš„å»ºç­‘ï¼ˆéš”ç€è§†çº¿ä¸¤æ¡è¡—ä¹‹åä¾§å‰æ–¹ä¸€åº§3-5å±‚æ¥¼é«˜çš„æ£•è‰²å»ºç­‘ï¼‰ã€æˆ‘çœ‹åˆ°é‚£ä¸ªç¡®è®¤äº†æˆ‘ä»¬è¿™æ˜¯å›åˆ°äº†ä¹‹å‰â€œä¸æ­£å¸¸â€çš„ç¯å¢ƒä¹‹ä¸­ã€‚

ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚

ï¼ˆè¿™å„¿è·³è¿‡ä¸€å¤§æ®µå¯¹äºåœºæ™¯ç»†èŠ‚çš„æè¿°ï¼Œä¸»è¦åŒ…æ‹¬ï¼šåˆšå‡ºæ¥çš„æ—¶å€™å¯¹äºè¡—é“å’Œå¼‚å¸¸çš„è´¨ç–‘ã€åœ°é¢ä¸Šç ´æ—§åºŸå¼ƒä½†ä»æœ‰äººçƒŸå¹¶ä¸”éƒ¨åˆ†äº‹ç‰©è¿˜æŒºå¹²å‡€å´­æ–°çš„æ··åˆä¸°é£æ ¼ã€å‘å³è½¬å‘å·¦è½¬å’ŒåˆæœŸçš„åœ°é¢èƒ¡ä¹±èµ°åŠ¨æ¢ç´¢ã€å¿«è¿›å…¥åˆ°å»ºç­‘æ—¶ç»è¿‡çš„è¡—é“ã€ç¦»å¼€å»ºç­‘æ—¶çœ‹åˆ°çš„æ™¯è±¡ï¼‰

å¤–é¢æ˜¯ç ´æ—§çš„ç»ç’ƒå¢™å£åŠå…¬å¤§æ¥¼ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨é‡Œé¢ï¼ˆå’Œå‡ ä¸ªé‡åˆ°çš„éäººï¼Ÿï¼‰åƒPizzaå’Œåˆ«çš„ä¸œè¥¿ã€è„‘æµ·ä¸­ä¾ç¨€æƒ³åˆ°è‡ªå·±è¦åƒç´ é£Ÿå’Œå¥åº·é£Ÿç‰©æ¥çš„ã€‚æ—è¾¹çš„äººåæ§½æˆ‘ï¼ˆå°¤å…¶æ˜¯å‡ ä¸ªé‡åˆ°çš„éäººï¼‰ä¸è¯¥æŠŠè¿™ç§ç‰¹å®šçš„Pizzaå’Œé‚£ç§ç‰¹å®šçš„ç±»ä¼¼Root Bearæˆ–è€…Dr. ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼ˆå‘½è¿çŸ³ä¹‹é—¨é‡Œé¢é‚£ç§é¥®æ–™ï¼‰ã€åŒ…è£…é¢‡ä¸ºèŠ±å“¨çš„æ±½æ°´ä¸€èµ·å–ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æˆ‘è§‰å¾—è¿™æ ·å‘³é“æŒºå¥½ã€‚åƒç€åƒç€æˆ‘é€æ¸å‘ç°å¦å¤–ä¸‰ä¸ªä¼™ä¼´æ€ä¹ˆå¥½åƒè¶Šæ¥è¶Šæ²¡æœ‰åŠ›æ°”äº†ã€åœ¨é‚£å‡ ä¸ªé‡åˆ°çš„é™Œç”Ÿäººåæ§½ä¸­æˆ‘çªç„¶æƒ³åˆ°ä»–ä»¬æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯æ•…æ„çš„ã€è€Œè¿™å°±æ˜¯å¹»æœ¯çš„ç›®çš„ä¸ºäº†å‰Šå¼±æˆ‘ä»¬ã€‚æˆ‘èµ¶ç´§è®©åŒä¼´ä»¬ä¹Ÿè¿™æ ·åƒã€ä¸€è¾¹è­¦æƒ•è¿™æ ·çš„å»ºè®®ä¼šå¼•èµ·violenceã€‚ä¸è¿‡è¿˜å¥½ä»–ä»¬æ²¡æœ‰å¤šè¯´ä»€ä¹ˆã€‚

åæ¥æˆ‘ä»¬ä¼¼ä¹ä¹˜åäº†æŸç§äº¤é€šå·¥å…·ç¦»å¼€å¤§æ¥¼ã€ä¼¼ä¹æ¹–æ°´æœ‰æ‰€å˜åŒ–ä½†æ˜¯ä¸è®°å¾—ã€‚

--

æ—¶é—´å…³ç³»è¿™ä¸ªå¤§æ¢¦ä¸å®¹å¤šè®°ã€‚ä»¥ä¸‹ä¸ºè¦ç´ ï¼š1ï¼‰æ­¤æ¢¦å¢ƒå‡ºåœºï¼ˆæ¢¦å¢ƒåŸç”Ÿï¼‰äººç‰©ä¼—å¤šï¼Œæ‰€è§ç»†è‡´è§‚å¯Ÿç©¿è‘—ç›¸è¿‘å’Œå„å¼‚çš„å¥³éƒå°±æœ‰è‡³å°‘2-7ï¼ˆåœ¨äºæ‰€ä¸“æ³¨æ—¶é•¿ï¼‰ä¸ªã€èƒŒæ™¯å¥³éƒæ— æ•°ï¼Œåœ¨æˆ‘ä¸Šæ¥¼æ¢¯çš„æ—¶å€™é‡åˆ°çš„ä¿å®‰å’Œä¾åº”äººå‘˜å°±æœ‰3-5ä¸ªã€ä½†æ˜¯æ¥¼æ¢¯ä¸Šä¼¼ä¹å‡ºäº†æˆ‘æ²¡ä»€ä¹ˆåˆ«çš„visitorï¼Œåé¢æˆ‘å…·ä½“è®¿é—®æˆ¿é—´å‰è·¯è¿‡çš„å¥³éƒå’Œå¥³æ€§é¡¾å®¢ä¾ç¨€è®°å¾—çš„æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªï¼ˆä¸€ä¸ªç™½è‰²è¡£æœï¼‰ã€æˆ¿é—´ä¸­åæ¥å›æ¥çš„æœ‰ä¸‰ä¸ªï¼ˆé•¿ç›¸ä¸€èˆ¬ï¼Œç©¿ç€è¿˜æŒºå¥½ï¼‰ï¼Œ2ï¼‰æ­¤æ¢¦å¢ƒå¯¹è¯é¢‡å¤šè€Œä¸”å†…å®¹ç»†è‡´ï¼ˆå…¨éƒ¨é—å¤±ï¼‰ï¼Œä¸»è¦åŒ…æ‹¬ï¼šè¿›å…¥Clubä¹‹å‰é—¨å£çš„ä¾åº”å¥³ç”Ÿè¯´çš„è¯ï¼ˆè‹±æ–‡ï¼‰ã€æ¥¼æ¢¯è·¯ä¸Šç¢°åˆ°å®‰å…¨äººå‘˜å¯èƒ½æœ‰çš„å¯¹è¯ã€åœ¨æˆ¿é—´é‡Œè·Ÿåæ¥è¿›æ¥çš„ä¸‰ä¸ªå¥³ç”Ÿçš„å¯¹è¯ï¼ˆä¸­/è‹±æ–‡ï¼Ÿï¼‰ï¼Œ3ï¼‰æ•´ä¸ªç›®å…‰æ‰€è¿‡ä¹‹å¤„Clubå†…é¥°å¤§æ°”ç²¾è‡´ã€ä½†æ˜¯å› ä¸ºç°åœ¨éš¾ä»¥recallåœ°é¢æ¥¼æ¢¯å’Œæˆ¿é—´å››å‘¨ä¹‹å¤–åœºæ™¯ç»†èŠ‚æˆ‘å¯¹è¿™ä¸€ç‚¹å¼€å§‹æ„Ÿåˆ°ä¸ç¡®å®šã€‚4ï¼‰åœ¨æˆ¿é—´é‡Œé¢çš„ç±»ä¼¼äºå”±æ­Œï¼ˆä½†æ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰è¯ç­’å’Œç”µè§†æœºï¼‰ç¯å¢ƒä¸­ä¸‰ä¸ªå§‘å¨˜ï¼ˆä¸ç¡®å®šä¹‹å‰æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯æœ‰åˆ«äººã€æ²¡æœ‰å¸¦ç‰©ä»¶çš„è¡¨æ¼”è€…æˆ–è®¸ï¼‰çš„æ”¾åœ¨coachä¸Šçš„å¤–å¥—å’Œå®å®ä»¥åŠé‡Œé¢çš„ä¸œè¥¿å¾ˆç»†è‡´ï¼ˆæ²¡æœ‰æ¥å¾—åŠç»†çœ‹çš„å…¶ä»–ä¸¤ä¸ªäººçš„ä¸è®°å¾—ä¹Ÿå› æ­¤ä¸ç¡®å®šï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ¥å¾—åŠç»†çœ‹çš„é‚£ä¸ªå¤§åŒ…é‡Œé¢ä¾ç¨€è®°å¾—æœ‰è®¸å¤šå¥³ç”Ÿæºå¸¦çš„ä¸œè¥¿ã€ä»¥åŠä¸€å¤§æŠŠæ‰“å°çš„çº¸å¼ ï¼‰

ï¼ˆå¤§æ¢¦ï¼‰Alleyã€stareã€nameã€bossã€no access csrdï¼Œsuccessful business manã€many roomã€ï¼ˆuncontrolledï¼‰lucid dreamã€stare article print paper, hold door, hide objects, fancy door decoration, wall declaration, carpets. Large room, drinks? I might have been to somewhere similar to this before.

å½“æ—¶æˆ‘å·®ä¸å¤šæœ‰ç‚¹æ„Ÿè§‰åˆ°è¿™ä¸ªåœºæ™¯çš„æ¢¦å¢ƒæœ¬è´¨ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¹¶æ²¡æœ‰å°è±¡æ¸…æ™°æ·±åˆ»åˆ°æ¿€å‘ä¸»åŠ¨å½±å“çš„æ¸…æ˜æ¢¦ã€‚é‚£ä¸ªå¥³ç”ŸåŒ…ä¸­ä¸°å¯Œçš„ä¸œè¥¿ä¸€ä¸‹å¸å¼•äº†æˆ‘çš„æ³¨æ„ï¼Œå¯¹äºåŸæ¥ä¸Šæ¥æ‰¾é‚£ä¸ªè°ã€åˆ°åº•åœ¨å‡ å·æˆ¿é—´ã€ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆæ²¡æœ‰ç›´æ¥å¼•å¯¼æˆ‘ä¸Šæ¥å’Œä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆäººè½¬çœ¼å°±ä¸è§äº†çš„é—®é¢˜æŠ›ä¹‹ä¹éœ„äº‘å¤–ã€‚åŒ…åŒ…é‡Œä¼¼ä¹æœ‰è€³æœºå’Œå°ç†Šä½†æ˜¯å¸å¼•æˆ‘çš„æ˜¯ä¸€å æ‰“å°çº¸ï¼Œä¾§æ”¾åœ¨åŒ…ä¸­çš„çº¸ä¸Šç¬¬ä¸€é¡µæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªä¼¼ä¹æ˜¯å­¦æœ¯ç›¸å…³çš„æ ‡é¢˜ï¼Œæˆ‘çŒœæƒ³è¦ä¹ˆæ˜¯å­¦ä¹ èµ„æ–™è¦ä¹ˆæ˜¯å®Œæˆçš„è®ºæ–‡è¦ä¹ˆå°±æ˜¯å…¶ä»–é˜…è¯»ç­‰ã€‚å½“æ—¶æ‹¿å‡ºæ¥ç¬¬ä¸€å¼ çº¸ä»”ç»†é˜…è¯»äº†ä¸€ä¸‹â€”â€”æˆ‘ä¸è®°å¾—æ˜¯å¦æ—¶é—´ç‰¹åˆ«ç´§å¼ äº†ä½†æ˜¯å¾ˆæ˜æ˜¾çš„æ²¡æœ‰å»å¤ªç»†è‡´é˜…è¯»å’Œè®°å¿†ï¼ˆé€ æ¢¦ä¹‹æœ¯ï¼šæƒ³æ¥å¤–å‡ºæ¸¸ç©çœ‹åˆ°æ‚å¿—æˆ–è€…å…¬å¸é—²æ”¾æ‰“å°çº¸åªä¸€ç¥æˆ‘ä»¬ä¹Ÿä¸èƒ½å¤Ÿè®°ä½è®¸å¤šã€è¿™ä¸€æ–¹é¢å¯ä»¥è®­ç»ƒï¼‰ï¼Œæ»¡é¡µçš„æ–‡å­—ã€å°¤å…¶è®©æˆ‘æƒŠè®¶çš„æ˜¯å½“æ—¶æ‹¿å‡ºæ¥çœ‹ä¸€æ–¹é¢æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†éªŒè¯å’Œç ´åæ¢¦çš„integrityã€å› ä¸ºæ–‡å­—ï¼ˆæ®è¯´ï¼‰æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªchallengeã€‚ä½†æ˜¯é¦–å…ˆæ–‡å­—å¹¶æ²¡æœ‰å˜ä¸ç¨³å®šã€è€Œæ–‡æ³•ç­‰å› ä¸ºç°åœ¨ä¸è®°å¾—æ‰€ä»¥ä¸çŸ¥é“å½“æ—¶æ˜¯å¦ä¹Ÿé€šé¡ºã€‚

--

Remarkï¼šæƒ³æ³•æ˜¯ç®€å•åœ¨Universal Diaryè®°å½•å°±ç®—äº†ï¼Œä½†é‚£ææ€•æ²¡ä»€ä¹ˆæ„ä¹‰ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ­¤å¤„ç®€è®°ã€ä»¥åŠannnotateã€‚

Remark: 

1. One unfortunate and important part of this dram was the texts on the note.
2. The raw note itself is not readable to general audience.






ä¸¢å¤±ä¸€äº›æ­Œæ‰‹å’Œæ­Œåï¼ˆæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ­Œæ‰‹è‰ºåæœ‰12ä¸ªå­—ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸‰ä¸ªå››å­—çŸ­è¯­ä¾‹å¦‚â€ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿ ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿ æƒ†æ€…ç”·å­©â€œã€ä»¥åŠç–‘ä¼¼Originalçš„æ­Œæ›²æ—‹å¾‹å’Œæ­Œè¯ï¼ˆâ€œå¤é›¨è’™è’™æˆ‘ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿæƒ…æ·±ï½â€11235432213etcï¼Œ80å¹´ä»£ï¼‰ï¼ˆæˆ‘ç›´æ¥ä»¥ä¸ºæ˜¯åœ¨Miä¸Šä½†æ˜¯å¥½ä¼¼åœ¨Doä¸Šå¬èµ·æ¥æ›´æ­£ç¡®äº›ï¼‰â€”â€”æƒ³èµ·æ¥ç»†è‡´å»å¬è®°å·²ç»é†’æ¥ã€‚

ä¸€ç›´åœ¨è·Ÿé»„æ°å‘æ¶ˆæ¯ã€å†™é‚®ä»¶å’Œå¯¹è¯ã€‚

æ¢¦çš„æœ€åæˆ‘ä»¬åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªç±»ä¼¼äºå°å¯ºåº™ã€æ—¥å¼é“åœºã€å®¶ã€å­¦æ ¡å®¿èˆçš„æ··åˆçš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼ŒèƒŒæ™¯ä¸€ç›´åœ¨æ’­æ”¾å°†è¿‘ä¸‰ä¸ªä»¥ä¸Šä¸åŒæ­Œæ‰‹ä¸åŒæ­Œæ›²ï¼Œæˆ‘å¬ç€è¿˜ä»¥ä¸ºæ˜¯çˆ¶äº²é‚£ä¸ªå¹´ä»£çš„æ­Œï¼ˆé†’æ¥å‘ç°ä¸å®Œå…¨ä¸€æ ·ï¼‰ã€‚ç©¿è¿‡ä¸€ç‰‡ç«¹æ—ã€pebbleå°è·¯æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªé—¨å¤–ä¹Œé»‘ã€é‡Œé¢æœ‰æ˜Ÿç‚¹é‡‘è‰²çƒ›å…‰çš„å®¤/å ‚ï¼Œå¥½å¥‡è¿‡å»çœ‹ä¸€çœ¼ã€‚æˆ‘åœ¨ä¸€å¤„å–å‡ºæŸæ—¥è¯­ç»æ–‡è§‚èµï¼Œé»„æ°å¥½å¥‡ä¹Ÿè¿‡æ¥çœ‹ã€‚

åæ¥æˆ¿é—´ä¸­ç¯å…‰ä¸å¥½ï¼ˆæˆ–è€…è¢«æˆ‘ä¸å°å¿ƒå…³äº†ï¼‰ï¼Œæˆ‘å»é‡æ–°å¼€å…³ç¯ã€‚å¥¹è·Ÿæˆ‘è¯´ä½ å¼€ç¯åˆ«æŠŠæˆ‘è¿™å„¿æ¡Œå­ä¸Šçš„æ‰“å¼€å‘€æˆ‘åœ¨çœ‹ç”µè§†ã€‚è¿™æ˜¯æ—è¾¹æ¥äº†å¦å¤–ä¸€ä¸ªç”·ç”Ÿã€‚

ï¼ˆTopicï¼ŒUndevelopedï¼‰å½“ä½ è·Ÿä¸€ä¸ªäººçœŸçš„å¹¶ä¸é‚£ä¹ˆç†Ÿæ‚‰æ—¶ï¼ˆä»€ä¹ˆå«åšâ€œä¸ç†Ÿæ‚‰â€ï¼Ÿå…¶å®æˆ‘ä»¬è¯´ä¸å®šæŒºç†Ÿã€‚æ”¹ä¸ºï¼šå½“ä½ çˆ±çš„äººè¹™çœ‰ä¸æ»¡æ—¶ï¼‰ï¼Œä½ é†’æ¥æƒ³å¿µå¥¹çš„ç©¶ç«Ÿæ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆï¼Ÿ

å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯æœ‰äº›æƒ³å¿µå¥¹ï¼Œç„¶åæ²¡æœ‰ç„¶åã€‚æˆ‘æˆ–è®¸è¯¥å¤šè¯»ç‚¹æ–‡å­¦ï¼Œit's hardã€‚

# æ¢¦çš„ç‰¹ç‚¹

æ¢¦çš„ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼Œå› å…¶æœ‰é™çš„â€è®°å¿†Recallâ€œ capacityï¼Œå¸¦ç»™äººvery specific ideasã€‚åŒºåˆ«äºç°å®ä¸­éå†åœºæ™¯çš„overwhelming detailï¼Œæ¢¦ä¸­æ›´èƒ½å¤Ÿå¸å¼•äººçš„æ˜¯â€åŸæœ¬å°±æ›´å…³æ³¨çš„â€œé‚£äº›äº‹ç‰©å’Œæƒ…æ„Ÿçº¿ç´¢ã€‚

æˆ‘ä»¬ä»¥å‰æœ‰ä¸ªè¯´æ³•å«â€æ¢¦ç”Ÿé•œç•Œâ€œï¼ŒæŒ‡çš„å°±æ˜¯é‚£ä¸€ç§è¿‘ä¹çº¯ç²¹ï¼ˆåˆ°æ‰§å¿µï¼‰çš„æ„Ÿæƒ…æ€æƒ³ã€‚ä¾‹å¦‚å¾ˆä¹…ä»¥å‰çš„Dream Eraï¼Œè·Ÿæ¢¦ç”Ÿäººç‰©çš„â€œåˆ¹é‚£æ°¸æ’â€é™è°§é•œç•Œã€‚è¿™æ ·ä¸€ç§æƒ…æ„Ÿä¼¼ä¹å…·æœ‰å…¶è‡ªèº«çš„è‰ºæœ¯çº§åˆ«ï¼Œå°šä¸”å¾…å‘æ˜ã€‚

ä½†æ˜¯æ¢¦ä¸­çš„äº‹ç‰©å¿…é¡»è¢«éš”ç¦»ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¿™æ ·ä¸€ç§çº¯ç²¹çš„æƒ…æ„Ÿå› å¤±å…¶å¤æ‚å’Œå†…æ¶µè€Œåœ¨ç°å®ä¸–ç•Œä¸­æ˜¯éš¾ä»¥ç”Ÿå­˜çš„ã€‚å°¤å…¶å½“ä¸€ä¸ªäººæœ¬ä¸å…·æœ‰å“è¶Šçš„ä¼˜åŠ¿æ—¶ã€‚

# Reference Study Skill ï¼ˆé€ æ¢¦ä¹‹æœ¯ Subjectï¼‰

1. Memoryæ­Œè¯ã€æ—‹å¾‹ã€æ­Œæ‰‹åç§°
2. ç®€è°±è®°è¿°
3. å¯ºåº™ç»“æ„è¯æ±‡
4. æ—‹å¾‹ã€éŸ³å¾‹ã€éŸ³å‡†






It was a bad night's sleep. I went to bed late last night because I wasnt sleepy last night until 12:30 (because I slept for over 9 hours the previous night) and I was excited (in a very MC-specialized slightly-suprrssed way) thinking about I am going back to school and taking another PEY stuff. So my mind couldn't really rest and it seemed for a long time I had vivid thoughts going on in my mind (and it's not a loop dream, I simply wasn't falling asleep deep enough).

Hu and Liang were there at my room... I won't recall exactly what we talked about and what they did but there is nothing "special" - at that moment I was just natural and they seem to either live there or come to visit me a lot - and oh they are not lovers nor too intimate to make me feel uncomfortable. But Hu was mentioning something (which I won't recall) and it seemed about organizing stuff. Let's be sure - it's very important and affected my later decisions that's why I have to mention here name here but I won't recall.

I looked outside the window once before later actions, and **felt deeply uncertain whether I am dreaming or not, and dare not wasting my life trying the unwise**. An old question came to me: how do you know, how do you be sure you are dreaming when you are dreaming? Especially when nothing went wrong. (I think this part of thinking might be inspired from the reading on Philosophy of Dreams, and the point is: *you haven't really been there unless you have dreamed about it* - or for that matter unless you have actually went there physically or played in VR. The situation of questioning the reality *@never played an role** in my waking life, but this time during the dream I questioned it, and when I first contemplate that, I felt unsure how to solve it. The determining factor might be: you gotta to have the doubt that your reality might not be entirely real at first place.)

**It's unlike any other dreams - or lucid dreams for that matter**. I seem to know what I was doing, or I was there, vividly and clearly there and speculating about my own situation. ... 

I had an urge to do something not possible in regular situation, and I thought about jumping out of the window like what I did last time (last time I jumped out of the balcony). (the one other piece exact thought was lost). But that's not exactly what I wanted. I wanted to challenge myself - about the height, and do it without supoort!

I've been thinking and appreciating her role in this dream/expedition, missing her a bit, I will probably message her when I go back....

Finally I get the courage - not without doubt and suspicion, and went with one leg over the window (the window has two doors, much like my own balcony door, one is glass, the other is çº±çª—). And while doing that I suddenly remembered I could have checked using **bite finger** trick. I tried three times until in the last time I bite so hard it actually made my finger feel uncomfortable (might be more emotionally than "physically" because I was biting so deep it's very weird). And I feel much more certain - and realizing this was **nothing like my previous lucid dreams** (more to come). For one thing, I never had that initial or sudden realization "I am actually in a dream", and before and after this action the vividness of consciousness doesn't have sudden change. 

Now a note regarding how this dream is special (and very unfortunately I can't remember all the visual details nor can I possibly record them after waking up while trying to be a bit healthier to my eyes and morning awaking body): both long before and well after I decided to climb over the window until I wake up, the dream had been so realistic, so **normal**, so **unaffected**, that not just visually, but behavior-wise speaking nothing seemed weird. (And I won't go into detail why this is worth discussing or remembering to talking about, or why it is worth being considered special) 

So I climbed out of the window, now ascertained, but still feeling unbelievable about what is in front of my eyes (as mentioned below, memory about distant objects are unfortunately lost; (Dream study) my memory about my own impression always seemed to last longer and easier to recall - but as one philosopher pointed out, could all those impressions be fake because I couldn't pull up evidences? Or even if I can pull up evidences they can still be "fake" in a sense it's recalled/created in retrospect, not at a previous time - I clearly don't buy his words) - it's literally like looking outside my own window (now when I think about it - it's not exactly like "looking outside my own window" because that sight and location wasn't anywhere real I have been to!)  The grounds, the kids downstairs, the vegetation, they all seemed so natural. 


... (For time reason, skip stories about see various people in each floor while climbing down, especially noticing the pattern of floor utilization every other floor: and in particular in around the 3rd floor below a girl doing her exam was looking at me, clearly bewildered and at the same time not knowing how to complete her exam paper. Also skip the interaction with school kids and Yu Hanwen later while I went down and trying to decide which way to walk on - which edge of the two walls)

There was disgusting deep-green paint-like watery and curling plant like thing sticky on top corner of my desks and I had to clean them up using large amount of kitchen tissue. And talk to many other people saying it's disgusting. Mom at side saying it's called "Impergiun" (pronounce: in-pe-gin) , and it told her during lunch. I was about to argue it's not lunch yet. But well she's psychic and what can I say.

I can still be there and think and talk about it in more detail but I really feel I should come back, especially since this name won't be easy to memorize.

The last glimpse I had over the room was empty white with usually çŸ³è† bumpy roof as in my North York residence.

Remark:

1. Memory eclipses fast (like time pass by) and I am recording this from back to start.
2. Of course this dream will improve my closeness to her.

---

Room Layout:

Square living room, right is window; left is door. There is a room (washroom) near the door. There is a room behind. Outside the window the room located in top floors of the bullding. Two floors below there is a 10cm-20cm think wall much like the ones I often see in primary school or back in the village. The wall connects this building to another one covering a small area of garden. Outside the wall further to the "right" (as mentioned above) was a large ground of regular buildings .... (Details lost)






Some people among us are ghosts. They are only be visible for 8 hours, then their human world time is up, and they cannot be seen. Some ghosts enjoy not being seen - that means they can do anything they want for they can still interact and stay in this world. Others are sad about it, because that makes them distant from things and people they love. Some go to where they belong - the underworld.

Underworld is not much different from our world. Some places of underworld have more severe weather and soil, others are just like ours - green lands, hills, mountains, trees, lakes, sky. Even plants and some animals grow and live in the underworld. The only issue is, underworld is lonely, and that loneliness is not caused because of not knowing each other's name, but because of power. Everyone upon entry of underworld will gain a superior power - a power than can either change, create, or destroy. No punishment is more cruel than giving someone a deadly power and set them free. There is no government nor rule down there, all you have to worry about is yourself, your own feelings, your own pleasure. When a person enters the underworld, she no longer feels hungry, her body doesn't need food, nor does it need any other mundane maintenance. The animals and plants in underworld are not edible. Life is boring. The only meaningful thing to do seems fighting, or being killed. Killing gives a momentary sense of strong pleasure, every single nerve of body gets excited and one's senses become clearer rather than the usual dull feeling when living there. Being killed and almost-instant reborn - or maybe many years have past, you won't know - at somewhere else, with some completely new power, is a way to start over. Very few people seem to stay long before being killed or killing themselves. You can't really have friends, you can't even look into people's eyes.

It was a lonely place. Every time you reborn, you forget a bit about past. Given long enough, you forget about yourself, your purpose, your life, and why you are here. You become a monster like everyone else, not caring anything about the world, driven by the hunger of power, abusing and acquiring new senses. Some even can no longer speak. Maybe I am just a weirdo, I like to go back to my world, see my family, even though they cannot see me nor talk to me. It took a while to let then know it was me, but afterwards they seemed to accept it well. We reached a consensus to always come back at the beginning of each month, and I would just stay in my room. Mom always kept the room clean. She removed the bed, and put a large table in the center of the room. It always had many fruits and various contemporary objects. I couldn't ear or talk, but I was always glad to hear her talking about life with father, things going on in the world, for 8 hours straight, except for the lunch. Later it became of a ceremony, she would dress up, do special arrangement of the room, and ask father to come and say a few words sometimes. Sometimes I wanted to cry, but all I could do is to hug her. She must have felt something, her body shocked when I touch her. "Warm" she said.

When sister came to the underworld, I found her and persuaded her not to use her power. Then we would go back to human world together. We are the shadow of our family, but that's fine, at least it's something enjoyable, at least they still remember us and they are always welcoming.






ï¼ˆGame idea) Non biased, single-map customized (inspired by Fortnite), online 100 players session (automatic regional matching by proximity and login time and per previous session to get friends in the same city), Played with Ray last time, the map has at its lower left corner a north and south base as initial exploration point. South base features a woman NPC talking and selling 3 kinds of basic weapons including a free heavily custom made AK47 with MP4 like æ”¾å¤§é•œ, a little to the right to that region is a waste region with various materials. The game is called "Wasteland" or something like that, and zombies starts to act at night. The game has no rule and is just about surviving, killing, crafting, and spontaneous strategy and organization. "Let's play together together as a technical group and survive for a few days" the game begins at somewhere near lower left corner. We shall combine this part of map idea with a dream long time ago similar concept open map boundary and there is a fraction somewhere center of the map a lot of dead trees and it's a plain. The map should be around 1-10 km in size and is photorealistic and feature rich (with little dynamics e.g. weather and map-wise animation). No mobile vehicles or player customization, it's just a hardcore open free RPG like explorable FPS shooter. Developed with UE4 and C++. Game session is persistent per region (configured through console, player can switch session), each session is hosted by one server and refreshed non-periodically when it's no longer playable but it should never happen because resources are closed (except ammos) and can be recycled. There are 3 commands: info, new and join. Players can only talk and it's hearable only to people nearby. If player dies the bodies pile up for a while (handled by server). All assets handmade so the game can be open source.

2rd, 3rd day, it's easy to live with a shelter. My building in 16 is still there. It's just father left it really sorry. A lot of food is still in the fridge however there are plenty on the ground. (Didn't realize it was a dream). I start to feel surprised (delightly) when I see Warren talking with a man on my Balcony when i was planning to go to bed and while I was putting some food into fridge. And saw to my surprise balcony window is higher and other people's balcony is actually below my window. "Hey Warren - you are Warren right?" "Yes?" "I know you from another world" "well I won't be so sure here" "you are probably right". It's a different world, brutal, though he still wear those cool colored glasses, and smile like he do, he might become cruel by the world. Still it's good to not be alone here. Probably because i was named while talking to him. Talking about naked, I see an old man taking bath in a plastic the in building 18 in the twilight. Well it's a different world, and maybe it's not so rude in this bad time without all the cleaning. (When I played downstairs there was only a very smelly and disgusting plastic bag for sleeping)
Then when I go back front the balcony and (start to feel imptrssed) saw a dressed man taking a large piece of washer like black device across my room from door to Washroom entering a closet like back door to another room."Hey now is this how it works?!" I thought I locked. He didn't reply. I was in wonder seeing he put some left over clothes into proper place and the floor of the room transformed (it feels exactly like a 80s science fiction of modern house in my eyes!). I wondered whether it's polite to go and keep it.... (Other details are vivid but it's 5:35 in the morning so no more recording).

**Remark**

* Impression: Wasted factory, trench.
* See WasteLand game project (on Git).






Don't want to spend time recalling, nor can we possibly remake this scene (either using drawing or 3D), but it's gorgeous.

I was making a small 2D animation; Escape from village using secret tunnel; Fellow escapers killed; chasing robot alternate reality; whole city shutdown; warrior emerging pouring over streets. Fast pace background rhythmic music. Heavily stylized movieish characters.

"Whole city 'Microsoft Server Shutdown' message, and gigantic hovering land drop."

"9,9,9,9,9," reporting rebooting message.

To fight, or nowhere to escape. Higher power.

From Universal diary:

```
#Redream #Remark #CreativeProcessRemark #Problem 
If there are two things I care: project nine and my dreams, then I won't be able to capture them speedily, when inspiration comes. (See lost dream journal 20100817)
Both my 2D and 3D skills are not mature and efficient enough yet.
Sometimes we may have a hard time to recall or visualize, but other times, during particular mental states, I don't know how to keep those impressions.
```

But we shall recognize - those recognitions, those information, those identified problems, they are not knowledge. It's just fun and immersive. We need to dig deeper and turn it into "real value".

Dwell in personal creation or imagination and dreams alike are very dangerous - because it's a passive world, it develops fast without boundary of real world limitations, and it's only accessible by you. (Like personal gaming experience) They are not "real value" because it's not beneficial and enjoyable to others - at a least in its raw form. One must turn those personal experience into appreciable contents for others, to make those things less perishable.






9PM last night 2:30 get up work 5:50 back to sleep. Wake up several times quick short dreams, some are interesting e.g. "never realized my neighbours balcony has such curioslt out of proportion high hang roof and cute plants.

The main point:


Dropping, Ahhhhjjhhhhjjh MC-Like blocks, "hey you can't just to thjs there is no passes, block away. 
- Gaming and interaction with my own mind
What would we get if turn around and try to be realistic and get real...
This is library, let there be come people (talking and waking). I know this is not "out of body" per se, but what would he (Qin) think if I am so close. (Not excitement) In dreams our sense are indeed a bit magnified and thus "natural" like when we were young - in reality I would probably bother less.  (Feel very much like interaction in ææƒšçŠ¶æ€)
What is outside where is door
Losing senses...
Firs time maybe let's spending too long.

When waking up losing quick

Key points:

1. Gradually improve then obtained details

â€ä½ å½“æ—¶æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆèº«ä»½ï¼Ÿâ€œï¼ˆçµæ„Ÿæ¥æºå“ˆåˆ©æ³¢ç‰¹ç¬¬äº”éƒ¨å“ˆåˆ©æ¢¦é†’Wilsleyè¢«è¢­å‡»é‚£æ®µé—®é¢˜ï¼Ÿï¼‰æˆ‘å½“æ—¶åœ¨ä¸€æ—ã€è‡ªå·±ä¸åœ¨å…¶ä¸­ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚

* If care too much will "lost in (recalling) dreams" and make real life less casual and appear occupied.
* å°¤å…¶æ˜¯æ¥è¿‘å°¾å£°æ—¶ï¼Œå…¶å®æœ‰è®¸å¤šäººåï¼Œlostã€‚






è¢«é€šç¼‰ï¼Œé€ƒè„±åœ¨ä¸œå—äºšã€‚

å¯„å®¿åœ¨ä¸€å®¶äººã€‚

That was an exausting dream. Not physically, but mentally. Colleagues, parent, campus, iskra, and Jerry. 

It's my last day at the campus, (company) so  there really isn't much to do, I was planning to leave early as  soon as I realized my personal data has already een wiped out and my account no longer has any access to company services.
In the end, Jerry slipped out of the exam room and asked me "é‚£ä¸ªæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸Šæ¬¡æ‘é‚£ä¸ªä¸œè¥¿çš„æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œå°±æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆã€‚ã€‚ã€‚æ¥çš„ï¼›æˆ‘æ€ä¹ˆä¹Ÿå…ˆé¼“èµ·æ¥äº†â€œã€‚I know it's a question related to the exam, but judging from his ambiguous questions even mme, who is afterall behind all those exam, couldn't answer immediately. I woke up.

The last day on the company campus is the day of departure and the day for Warren to pick substitutes. An exam room has been setup on the side building neart he lake where they will select the ones who know the most of the project.  I arrived at the campus early in the morning, just to realize my accout has already beeen deactivated from most of the company programs. I devided to say goodbye to people around me and just leave cooly. At that time I was sitting in the corner area, the tables immediately near me sits, roughtly 8 people or so, and there are: Ali, .... and the last person, I regretly thought, we could have get to know each other better, she's so nice as I rememberd from our high school: æèã€‚

I went outside for some fresh air, passing through all those people hurry to the exam room. Near the end of the hall, Warren caught me and ask me to audit/ç›‘è€ƒ the exam for some itme while he's busy with something else before coming to audit it himself. He asked me to tell everyone the exxam ends at 9:20 (or 9:40). I went into the room, feeling special when all my peers are sitting in the exam while I am the one to walk freely. Everyone was talking and chatting animatedly while I entered, I shouted "Please get prepared for the exam" but the room was large and not many people heard me. I didn't try again but walked directly toward blackboard. That was a very special blackboard, it seemed old and greasy/smooth after too many use, some areas of the servace look patched. There are a large numberr of equations or something like that on the blackbboard, and since this room was used by another class I hesitated wipe them out. In the end I decided to write the time near the relatively clean corner of the balckboard. The classrom went quiet at that time, everyone was watching me write down the time. I wrote: "Exam Ends 9:20. Pelase Start Now." and I hear people start flipping their exam paper and writing. It was an exam about a project I made, to find someone most capable of taking it over.

I went outside for some fresh air, just near the exam center there was a desktop computer under shadow of a big tree. I sat there doing some browsing. I hear some girl talking in the near distance. It was Iskra, for around 30 minutes, she talked ,I listened, feeling at the same time sometihng stuck on  my throad couldn't breath easily. She was deeply engaged in her conversation and I have never seen her so happy in my life. Clearly she didn't notice my presence, so I kept my back to her. In the end she was tired standing and see there was a chair close and she leaned on the chair. We were so close, like we haven't been for such a long time, I can bet she's right behind my back. She talked about: â€œæˆ‘è·Ÿä½ è¯´å“¦ï¼Œé‚£ä¸ªå¤§ä¸‰çš„æ–°ç”Ÿã€‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚å­¦æ¶ä¹ æœºå™¨äººã€‚ã€‚ã€‚è€ƒè¯•ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚æˆ‘çš„æˆç»©ä¸è¡Œå•¦ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚â€ That must have been her boyfriend. She was talking about her expeirence lately and mentioned someone from a lower grade, the exams, the preparation, recent life, among many many other things. I might have been secretly recitign some of her words, but I have forgotten. It had been long enough that I felt uncomfortalbe with my chair, and I withfraw it a bit. She felt someone was there, and "Uh"ed, and just left. Oh I was approaching her and found my seat gradually behind her back. 

(Eating with parents and Jerry Wu and Nathan etc. and roar with parents, exuastive shouting, and complaining heavity to Anna and Ken about their misdoing; Shanwen asked how he might pursuade them into correcting ehaviors, but I thought of their stuborness and praies for the buddha and hopeless to chance who they already are. There was a wedding show near weilight/dawn, and some people setup booths for showcasing various å©šçº± design for a variety of cultures on the lands scatteredd around water. But we were having meal together, with my parents and collegues, clearly they have been visting here from China. For some reason I mentioned or they mentioned some future plan for me, and I felt enough of their controlling of me. I told Shanwen that my mother was like a control freak, but instead of controlling her husband, which she deeply conforms and wouldn't say a word (notice this is not true from reality), she controls me. I also told my parents they are horrible people, not just poor, but they dragged me into misery by giving me birth at first place. here was a lot of mean words like those, and I totally didn't care how they felt, how much happy they would have been seeing me again after suc ha long time and finally get a chance to teach me how to properly behave my self - I am just so tired and so sick of them they are revolting to me. After I calmed down and we break apart, I thought about it, and I felt my resentment towards my parent, though originally I was planning to tell Shanwen it's partly because their ignorance to me and partly bevause of my  bad romantic experience during junior high (now thinking about it, I think it's less about romance, but more about the overall education there), it occured to me it might simply because of the childhood constant arguments between my parents that make me sick of them. I would have loved them, bu tht people I loved are dead.






Remark:

This must be the most sophisticated dream I ever had. I don't believe it. It's so vast. I won't be able to record it all.

At first there were 6 seemingly isolated dreams watching from an angle like a surveillance camera. Those dreams are told to be connected. They tell a story about a murder and survival. In one of the scene there was a woman like a doctor (academic) and an old man (like her father?) Locked in a underground room (much like underground room in a Chinese community, well åœ°ä¸‹å®¤) trying to breaking out, it was really dim and it has a slightly sick greenish atmosphere 

Then there was me and someone walking together trying to find something. We went far out of the town (the town itself is simple with only a few tall sandy buildings on the side) and into near end of the broad road where there is construction work going on, (Epic) at least 4 or 5 massive machines are at work, the shortest of them is 90 feet tall (10 floors height). One of them has a large circular purple structure, they others also have very special and stunning structures. I only remember trying to squint my eyes and capture some of those details - somehow I thought, to my own surprise, that after that 6 dreams, this is still a dream, and we will need those informatikn for good. Even though I might forget after I truly wake up - it is surprising how at that dream I can think very very clearly and understand my circumstance well, including that I could judge there and I will forget when I get up. I tried to remember the material and texture of those constructions. But I only faintly remember it's a mixture between either metal or ceramic with something else.

Then there was the tour. Grand mountain, lots of trouists. On the side of the mountain where there is a vast plain area under the water fall (?) There was a show.

Then there was me sitting on a train which was used as top row of seats for a live stage when it went broken and they have to fire the train. Liu was in one of the seat compartments. We gently chatted.

Then there's was anothet tour, related, like a previous murder but a replica of a dream. Inside a building, I remember on one of the floors at the corner of the building there is a place for incents (ç„šé¦™?) . And that was part of the (7th dream?) Murder scene I had - the key at this point is that the memory of all previous dreams are still mixed together, either because it's part of the dream itself, or its because I was trying to keep the memory of previous dreams in my mind.

Then it was my mom. We lived in a very  very family, I lived a very very wealthy and successful life. There was a cause, and I inherited the house from a previous guy - there was one very specific moment st my childhood for this but I don't remember. And one day I left the building with mom at night. My uncle lved with us. .... While we were eating/talking, she finally asked, commandingly, " I need a debit card". It sounded hard. I hesitated, then I replied "sure, you are my mom, you can have my everything". Then she required again, "I also wish you to get rid your sister."

Remark:

* Very intense and strategic conversation with detailed facial clues;
* Very reasonable and realistic scene setup.

Idea:

* It might be beneficial, that instead of attempting to render any, we try to simply my best to record, and hand draw sketches (B/W, mostly focusing on structure and maybe texture), maybe with the help of 3D setup. **For each dream, make it complete**.
* A series of manga/comic can help better convey the story of the dream in this case.
* They all must happen within 5 hours to make it controllable and beneficial as practice. So we can schedule it.

She's just like the way I remembered her, this time a bit triumphantly shy.

Interaction with quite a few people in the family, lots of conversation. It was nervous before I know her choice/answer, but it was really pleasant to feel settled, with her.

Maybe in that case she still wants, it's just a bit shy while all the other classmates who like her are around? Visit a problem if she care a bit about their feelings while is also secretly triumphant as I am? Last time she's all over me (without sex) while talking and quite involved.

We were at my gtandparents-in-law's place, it's a large countryside house with spacious space and trees etc. outside it. * Monsters and ghosts.
* (A scope of definition) Remark on below scenes and how they actually belong to "the other world" rather than real world or a fantasy world or just ordinary dream world. First it's about people/creatures not just my own special experience like in lucid dream, second the world is largely a imagined one rather than a fantasy or real one (e..g in below we have worlds that seemly made from plastic and newspaper floating in the air), and behaviors of the people in those world don't follow ordinary patterns (I.e. they are slightly distinctly odd) - however the deciding criteria is this: even though their rationale are unfamiliar, it's distinct and appreciable. Beings of different ways to live their own colourful daily life, that's the Other World, like Spirited Away, not an underworld where people suffer or fantasy world where there is some underlying politics/organization etc  It's also because those worlds are entered from real world and exit to real world and they are scattered around, rather than necessarily geologically connected.

Grandma, village, old family. Carriage, cousin ï¼ˆå ‚å§), night trip. Slept with a large dog. Talk about monkey king.

When I wake up in the morning, my hand knocked the dog still in the mattress, and it tried to gently bite my hand, and I woke it up, and it went into the hallway. Then after a while a servant looking woman came down and seems to start preparing breakfast for me? (Though I didn't see that part), at that time I asked where is the washroom. 

(Special scene - the family tower) Old familily is very very rich, two families live together, one rent ours, both for the equal debt. It's a circular castle, marvel/ç»¿å®çŸ³ made. Washroom is on the 9th floor.
Two major toilets I see in the whatever floor, one has large transparent door (partly wooden) and clean toilet. The other is on the other side of the hall and it's completely enclosed with worden door. In between them inside the room was the shower/bath area where a small bath pool resides along with some other facilities I don't remember.

Flower ä»™å­ travel ground. Bad guy breaking stuff (trying to stop then arriving home. Explode bad guys stuff. Escape and hide under the ground. Very small world.  Floating world on the infinite sky. Plastic/paper made.

Drive (younger) sister home (later character identify changed to a generic one). Back home stranger noise, observed masturbation like bahvior. Argument (another boy, much like someone she's affected, me as observer point of view). Demonstrate the video, monstrance, no worry. There are roommates. Send back home. No way. Phone call,  wrong numbers, different service orovider. Called twice, can understand only "press 1" part, the rest unknown language. Downhill,  Fire fighters. Trade-off, leave her and guard in term. Pillow flight (not pillow fight), sword fight. Guide character. 

(Special scene - The downhill firefighter village.) I wanted to find a way out/back. (Now it reminds me, maybe at the very beginning when I was trying to send her back, we were following someone, then there was a delay caused by her catching up something, and the group has left out of sight, and we are lost how to go back) I found it easier to fly while sitting in a pillow (external power of the medium?) than entirely on my own.

(Special scene - the water village) (Important) Pass the exit I see myself standing on a platform above water, immediately ahead are many regions of flat ground where buildings atop. Those restaurant and entertainment buildings have distinct modern taste including 

Horror Movie: The Hole (at school bathroom bathtub) 

Remark: (On memory recall) Once in the night I woke up and reviewed some scenes (I remember it was 2) from a previous dream, at that time the two scenes was quick clear even though not entirely vivid. Now it's forgotten.

**Remark**: I was thinking about making those manga but I don't remember all the structural serials (I.e. the inspiration about what to tell and show). E.g. the village's layouts even though I was flying over it observing for a while. The other thing was the family tower which I was playing for a while on the first floor then somehow magically arrives in a higher floor.  The goal is authenticity, so there is no need to make up, so it's efficient. As a side effect of the grand scheme, not intentional design.

**Remark**: the lingering feeling decays very quickly the longer we are awake and that caused some difficulty not just in the recalling of detials, but also the **willingness** to make a record.

Problem Identification: Scenery details. As I mentioned in The Grand Scheme, memorizing those nontrivial first time details requires really the ability to memorize even the trivial looking (which are actually nontrivial but just because we are too familiar with them) serials in daily life, for instance:.

1. Detailed design I'd each subway station when we pass
2. Dressing of individuals as we see in the buss
3. Room layout of university buildings
4. Speeches of each person (exact original words possibly with distinct tone and sound)
5. Dynamic flow of people, of crowd, of cars and weather
6. Facial recognition (we are weak at this) and name recognition (we are weaker at this)
7. Travel and explore new places and consciously make a (mental) note of new features, remember the path and how we get to those places (e.g. Hart House layout, Tobomory travel route).







Tiffany had this weird symptom that every month at 24th she's very weak and will randomly fall down (lose conscious for a few minutes). I caught her just in time, though not fully, using my arms while noticing she was falling while going out with us. She said this also comes at the same time sometimes with her periods, which make the situation harder for her. Poor girl.

We were traveling into a circus like amusement park's haunted house. Three actors dressed like é»‘ç™½æ— å¸¸ came in and said the performance won't be much fun without them.

It was mild intro to the history of horror, and I want moaning like I can't help because I am feeling such a strange pain/discomfort on my lower leg. I suppose they injected some medicine for this effect. Hopefully it doesn't last long.






We accidentally get trapped into some inside the building and realized it would be a bug - the doors and basements windows are quickly getting sealed. There was a large hole on the ground, a girl was before is and went inside. We were secretly following, afraid she might be fine theirs. She heard is, and she pointed out there was even a boy before him. We went in together (4 of us). It's like a deserted construction place, end of it a large garage or production/logistics center much like Home Depot or Ikea thou gh cleaner.

A think voiced tall man accepted us and gave us a brief tour around as if this is nothing surprising. He obviously takes care of those wonders around and send them back safely.

Their weapons are not like electrically charged particles or glowing water bombs or symmetrical machine gun. 

I wish I could take a photos of those vehicles on the street, the scene is so real, it doesn't even look like what I am used to from svi fi - no shinny and super slick designs, but plain good cars that doesn't run on wheels. Phone camera doesn't work, it either sees nothing, or ordinary cars.

It's an ordinary building in the community, at the bottom there is a room for commercial area, quite small indeed. One of the door has the edited feature that at a particular time it becomes darker and you can enter it. While I was trying to get out, a girl standing outside waiting for bus saw my head poking out, and she become curious and tried to went it. I managed to stop her with hidden plates 

We are going to meet a respected man who lives by the water.

Mom insists we keep those shrines st home clean..

There are indeed very strong power field, we can clearly sense it while we go close to Buddha, jn fact, everything in the home now seem to vibrate some form of energy, (roughly 5 kinds?), And we had to fall back to my own room.

They have never heard of transistor! I thought it would be cool to give a lecture on it... "Maybe what we have discovered is that a different polarity of the facts, and your technology is developed based on the other polarity!"

Summary - Other World Feature

1. Entrance at real world, deserted and not used by people 
2. Other forms of existence, either being or technology or both
3. Pleasant and harmonic experience

```
Everyone 100 blood, everyone 0 energy
Every single move can accumulate 0.5 e:energy, other actions can accumulate energy
Mal is just a simple gtie, people start randomly per distribution
At every turn each person orally summarize.
Each person has an upgrade tree, per support/upgrade, e.g. TD (weak at beginning, getting much better latet, e.g. 2 to 3 points)
At the very beginning what each player can do is only to collect energy points and not doing much.
Key: self illustrative, 0 entry, talkative, memory.
Second upgrade chart can be acquired.
Chart contains a tree of energy actions at various energy points consumption e.g. 1.5-5 points. Each action/upgrade can possibly lead to next.
Others don't need to know what upgrades we have (this serve as a random even to othees as well, but we need to chant it)
æ£‹å­åªæ˜¯ä»£è¡¨ä½ç½®å’Œäººç‰©é¢œè‰²ï¼Œè·ç¦»ç§»åŠ¨æœ‰é™åˆ¶ã€‚
The map is purely abstract, with it straight and diagonal lines, maybe jump lines as well. Many people can gather all at the same spot (e.g. for close range attack).
Disks are huge #ij original dream): around 3 cm diameter. Slightly larger than grid size..
Random number sheet: date/seed (31), sequence, entry (Max 2, max 6, max 12 A-Z/number), multiplier/next sequence.
Every full cycle, GM/any player can announce some historical event about the progression/ background of the game world/new event. 
Map is abstract, but represent some events etc, can be downloaded and printed, have many many versions and affect strategy (and even size affect player number). (It's better if we can devise a way players can customize jt; As a "zelr-organjzed"/"0 background" game) Players need to count/memorize current turn, starting at 0.. That's the only "irrelevant" information that all people must memorize, otherwise just memorize its own stats and others stats. Others stats shall be annlunced only once as each player progress  because the information can be strategical 
A map can contain resources at grid points, as in the map /map event spec (two print tables). Whoever is moving three is responsible reading. (A reading game). Notice grid elements at known places are good - just like footnote, this is stratigical. Initial landing locations are known/not known.  Distribution of resources (on map) should be well balanced.
A separate (fantssy/game specific) item sheet/index shall be provided is so desired. E.g. weapon spec. Notice only first time use/discovery needs to announce it. Later it becomes a strategical element. Each game session by design can be quite optimized.
Optional element: each then can contain story or/and turn event pushing progressing of progress. 
The theme we were playing seem like robotic etc. related and supported by major banks as upgrade tree mauvering a wasted city.
Strategy/knowledge/entertainment points: story, memory, battle upgrade, other objectives, talking. Usually random number is not even needed. Called a "table top game scheme".

åœ°é“ä¸Šé‡åˆ°ä¸€å¤§å †ä¸€èµ·å‡ºæ¥ç©çš„å°å­¦åŒå­¦ï¼Œäº”å®˜ä¸€èˆ¬ï¼ˆä¸æ˜¯éå¸¸ç«¯æ­£ï¼‰ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¾ˆniceã€‚æ›¾ä¼Ÿã€ç­‰ã€‚ä¿©å¥³å­©å­å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªå¾ˆå¯çˆ±åå¦ä¸€å¼ æ¡Œå­èŠå¤©ï¼Œè¿™äº›ç”·ç”Ÿå°±çŸ¥é“ç©æ£‹ã€‚They said if they could have known a month ago some girls would have accompany. ```
```

See unlimitedbattle.com for more details.






* Background: IELTS classmates gathering, afterwards I practice fly techniques. 
* New: Here I didn't use classical concentration based simple Superman style flying, but first used some acceleration based inertia based lying down or åç©ºç¿» style flying, which is similar to my usual precious styles. But then I discovered something new: by stepping my foot rapidly in succession, I can push myself froward with strongly perceivable air drag and stepping feeling on my foot. At first the dragging force was very strong and it's hard to maneuver in air. Later after about 30 minutes of practice off main street I was able to be relatively stable and fly like walking gradually in the air, though still have some difficulty raising myself without falling back to classical techniques (details not remembered).
* Theme:. Another theme at the table was see Cherotte talking to William and other girls etc. yet not able to attract their attention. Another theme was me talking too loud in public to myself while on the air.
* Scene: In the end when I was able to move in the air with much less air dragging force I flied/walked over a house (traditional roof style like in Cartoon) where they planeted 6 pod sized small gardens on their roof.
* Observation: In the dream I deeply believed I already know the previous methods (I.e.before practising stepping skill) per previous experience and never doubted a bit that was a dream and not possible in "reality". 
    * Theory: In dreams, like in reality, we have a sort of self-confident/self-consistent memory, as if dream and real world are two semi-interfering but also independently coexist realities, each with its own unique identity.

Symbol: If we ever find ourselves capable of any sort of airborne behaviors without external device, we are certainly in the dream.






A beautiful and romantic love in a past and mix of modernity.

Three Kingdom. Mg last words to her, so.cs we won't come back: I wod have expected a better life for you ... You come back as queen of the ancient world, me writer of the modern ancient....

Ryan played her, said: I was shocked when you said come back every two years..

"No even if two years j won't be able to come back...."

It's beautiful and touching. Let's just let it go and forget the story between us.

Karen in the last minutes wanted to stay on the same car as her so he can confess....

If a man cannot live in a (good) dream, how can he ever feel safe staying in a (situation)/life that seems so good to be true/so good (for him) to  want to withdraw/leave? Where is the boundary between truth and reality? 

Is it true nothing lasts forever, and everything eclipse like a dream?
